1b1('bum): dum bu bcu ga reg pa'o// rab 'gror du byang chub sems dpa'i theg
1b2('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de dag gi bar ma 'dor te mo 'byung po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan 'thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor
1b3('bum): byang chub 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes pa 'am bu med kha la zhig/ bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ma mtsho'am/ mtshe'u 'am khrom pa nas nu la rus na
1b4('bum): rab 'byorang cu chu ba'i bum pa de bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga po'i mdu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen tha
1b5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyas chub kyi phyir dang pa yang yodagra bcu bzod pa yang yod
2a1('bum): par rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang de dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod
2a2('bum): bzod pa yang yod da mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod la/ de yang
2a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas
2a4('bum): yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongasasu bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pas yongs su
2a5('bum): bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyistong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sa yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
2a6('bum): yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong
2a7('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzug dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
2a8('bum): su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis sa yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
2b1('bum): bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
2b2('bum): su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pas yongs su bzung / dbang pos yongs su bzung / stobs kyis yongs su
2b3('bum): bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung 'phags pa'i lam yag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyis
2b4('bum): yongs su bzung / tshad myed pas yongs su bzung / gzung gus myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar rang
2b5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dwags yongs su bzung / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa te dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su bzung / 
2b6('bum): par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzind kyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / 
2b7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos
2b8('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su
3a1('bum): zun/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ga ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur te/ 
3a2('bum): nyes ma nyams par bla na myeng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shig zag ldan pa
3a3('bum): byas par rdzas bcug ste tshul btang na/ rab 'byor dgu don zhig par 'gyur te/ gru'ang logs shig/ rdzas kyang lags cig tu song nas/ dri ltar ching ba nga de thabs
3a4('bum): mkhas pas/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'argyangar zhing / rin po che chen po las yongs su 'ang bar mi par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ phyi chub
3a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang bla na myed pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ zod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lha
3a6('bum): pa'i bsam pa yang song/ dga' ba yang mdzo spro ba yang meng / myi gtong ba yang song / brtson 'grus myi 'do bya yang yod med kyi/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
3a7('bum): yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin dpas yongs sum brdung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
3a8('bum): ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas/ yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung
3b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
3b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / drin dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs
3b3('bum): su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
3b4('bum): bzung rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid da kyi sa yongs su ma ba zung / rang gi mtshan nyi da stong pa nyid kyis
3b5('bum): ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyisayongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sa yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong
3b6('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong
3b7('bum): ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
4a1('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chukyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pas
4a2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i
4a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / 
4a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa na/ mas kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams
4a5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yod sa su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs b+hA r+yAHyongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs
4a6('bum): su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzu / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
4a7('bum): ba bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis
4a8('bum): yongasu ma b.rung / rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rin po che'i don che bo dang bral zhing / rin po
4b1('bum): che chen po las 'brang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bar ma dor nye zho gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
4b2('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru sha nang du bsdams sha nad du bstar ba/ chu la gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na/ rab 'byor nga rgya mtsho'i
4b3('bum): gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur te/ gru des phyogs gang du bgrod pa de phyi nang par rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang de bzhin gshegs du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med
4b4('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dang ba yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod mi gtong / 
4b5('bum): ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod la de shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas bas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu
4b6('bum): phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / 
4b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
4b8('bum): yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis bzung / don ngom pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / mtha'
5a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
5a2('bum): bzung chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su brdung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su brdung / myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
5a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 
5a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyi sa yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i
5a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung
5a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par tha rang ba brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar
5a7('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyi sa yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung / 
5a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs banus yongasu bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung / snying rje chen pos
5b1('bum): yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad
5b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung na// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de na tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur bar rig bya'o// rab 'byor da de
5b3('bum): ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag po'i bsam
5b4('bum): pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba ya nga yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yid la/ de yang shes ra rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin par gyur pa/ bsam/ 
5b5('bum): gtan gri pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zi nad par gyur/ brtsenA/ 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind par gyur / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zi nad par gyur
5b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha ro long tu nang pas yongs su rnying bar gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyi nang paso yongs su zin par gyur du/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su rin par gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
5b7('bum): zin par gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zi nang par gyurapa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
5b8('bum): zin par gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su na par gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su rin par gyur/ mtha' las 'das bstong ba nyid kyis yongs su rin par gyur/ thog ma / 
6a1('bum): tham med brjod nyid kyis yongs su na par byed/ dod ba med pa songad nyid kyis yongs su yin dzA da~M/ bzhi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyu / sa pas
6a2('bum): byud kyis yongs su len par gyur/ rang gi stanan nyid bang nyid kyis yongs su na b+hU / mi rigs pa song panyid kyi yongs su rang bar gyur / ma po med
6a3('bum): sbos su ma nga/ kyis yos pa rjes sgyu / yid la gyur/ 
6a4('bum): yongs su zin par gyur / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gis sarnams kyis sangs su zin par gyur re/ dbang po rnams kyis yongs su
6a5('bum): zin par gyur/ stabs rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyurabyang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyu rang na 'khrugs bu'i lam ldan lag brgyad pas yong su zin par gyur
6a6('bum): 'dugs pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur de/ bsamang gtan rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur de/ chang med pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ gzugs meng ban+de
6a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ ma pang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su zin
6a8('bum): par gyur/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su zin par gyur pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su zin par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu
6b1('bum): rirapa gyur / gzus kyi rnams kyis 'ongs su min par gyur/ bde bzhin gshegs pa'i stongos pabanus yongs su zin par gyu nga / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su zin par gyur / ma so
6b2('bum): dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su zin par gyurang / byams pa chen pos yongs su phyin par gyu dang / snying rje chen pos yong su yin par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su zin/ 
6b3('bum): par gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin bur gyur pa/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis yongs su zin par gyur / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su zin par gyur na
6b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // rab 'byor dang 'di lta ste dper na/ min chod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon
6b5('bum): rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa/ 'khogs pa zhig yod la/ de'i lus la rlung ngam/ mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab na/ rab 'byor nga de la ji snyam du/ 
6b6('bum): sems/ mi de gcig pa 'am/ rangs su khrelasu ldang nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dri ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni khri lngas ldang nus lags kyang rgyang grags
6b7('bum): gcig sam/ rgyang thugs gnyis su mchi bar minus ti/ degs pa dang tho 'tshal bas nyam dems pa'i slad du khrilas ldang nus su 'gres kyang mchi bar mi nus so// bcom ldan dus kyis/ 
6b8('bum): bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dang pa yang song / bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa las
7a1('bum): yong lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yong / dga' ba yang yod/ sgo ba yang myong / mi gtod pa yang yod / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi de shes rab kyi pha rol de su byin pas
7a2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / rngubs mkhas pas yongs sum brdung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pas yongs su mA brgyu bung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod
7a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nul khrims kyu pa rol byin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyinang pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yong su ma bzung / 
7a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi das yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don
7a5('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas s+ho nga pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
7a6('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sa yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chos thams cad
7a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 
7a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sring pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran banye bar gzhag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnam
7b1('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs kyis yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu
7b2('bum): ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams
7b3('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
7b4('bum): pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongasu ma bzung mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin
7b5('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sa yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs
7b6('bum): su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
7b7('bum): bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung na
7b8('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ 
8a1('bum): yongs su ma bzung thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
8a2('bum): su ma bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pas yongs su ma
8a3('bum): bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
8a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su dam bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bdu
8a5('bum): ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs sum bcwo kyang ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
8a6('bum): su ma bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su mi bzung ba dang / 
8a7('bum): rang gi sa can nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 
8a8('bum): ngo mo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bu dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag
8b1('bum): bar spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis
8b2('bum): yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas
8b3('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ 
8b4('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par tharang ba brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mthar kyi das gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma
8b5('bum): bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / 
8b6('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 
8b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu ma bzung ba dang
8b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 
9a1('bum): rnam thams sadam byed pa nyid kyis sos sum bachu ba phyir ro// rab byor 'ag sa pa na/ min rtsod kyis thos brgya bu 'onapa/ rgyas b+ha nogs nga/ gzigs pa de nyi
9a2('bum): lus chung 'jigs / na 'dus pa kyis btab bar gyur na/ seM ni las ldang bar 'ad na/ des skyes bu thos ldan pa gnyis kyis klog cas gaben nas nga
9a3('bum): btan nas 'di skang du kye ma skyes bu khyod dga' pa'i don nyug 'dod par dong ngo // khyod ni bdag cag gis bzung gis gnas der ma phyin pa kyi bar du lam du bar ma dor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur
9a4('bum): zhes sgo ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dang pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod mos pa yang yod
9a5('bum): lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yong yod/ s+ya brtson 'grus mi 'dzi ra ba yang yod la de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa sa yong su bzung
9a6('bum): thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / 
9a7('bum): rdul khrims kyi pha rol su phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / bye stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / byi nang stong pa nyid kyis/ 
9a8('bum): yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 
9b1('bum): 'dus ma byas spong panyid kyis yongs su bzang / mtha' las 'das 'astong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dra ba ma sbed pa stong banyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
9b2('bum): bzung / rang nin myong bapyid kyis yangs su bzung / chos thams cad snang ba nyid kyis yong su bzung / rang gi mtshan nying stong ba nyid kyis yongasu 'byung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
9b3('bum): bzung / dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // dran pa nye bar gnag
9b4('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnam das kyis yongs su brdud/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnamasadakyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yong su bzung
9b5('bum): stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan la ga rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden
9b6('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par
9b7('bum): tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su
9b8('bum): bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu/ 
10a1('bum): bzung/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung / 
10a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
10a3('bum): yongs su bzung / rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bdag ni bzod pa sgom ma
10a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyinang pa rdar nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol dad tu phyinang pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ 
10a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sem sa dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
10a6('bum): sar lhung lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga don 'di 'dri bar sems pa/ 
10a7('bum): legs so legs so// rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ de bdag dang bdag gir ma ltung ba'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa'i yongs su
10a8('bum): gtong zhing rdul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de'ang bdag dang bdag gir ma lung ban
10b1('bum): sems kyis shes rab bsgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag tu sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / bdag na sbyin par byed pa'o// 
10b2('bum): bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni brtson
10b3('bum): 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go// 
10b4('bum): bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o// bdag ni shes rab bsgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom
10b5('bum): sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed bya'o// zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhe/ 
10b6('bum): rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed de/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus
10b7('bum): kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rnam brlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni/ 
10b8('bum): bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab kyis dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do// 
11a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i ba nomang du phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de'i du 'a ba ni sbyin po'i ba da du byi pa'o// rdul khrims kyi pa ri me tu byin pa la rtog pa de dag med de ring du song/ 
11a2('bum): ni rdul khrims kyi sa rol tu byin pa'o// bzod ba'i pha rolang tu nang pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du sang ba ni babod pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lod kyi byin pa la tog pu myed de ring duso
11a3('bum): ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog bla blad de/ ring du song ba ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
11a4('bum): rtog pu mud de ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu byi nang pa'o// de lta yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ring du song ba'ang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
11a5('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
11a6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi sto
11a7('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / byi nang stong pa nyid kyis yong su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yong su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
11a8('bum): ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i
11b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi
11b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
11b3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang da ga par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gi
11b4('bum): rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yo// ngas su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 
11b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis
11b6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thard pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
11b7('bum): dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
11b8('bum): yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dede bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa
12a1('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad
12a2('bum): shes panyid kyis yongs sum bzung / lAm gi rnam pa shes panyid kyis yongs sum brdung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pazhid kyis yongs sum bzung pas/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis rung sa
12a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs myi mkhas pas yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa
12a4('bum): theg pa ya thog mar thabs med pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs med par tshul khrims srung / thabs med par bzod pa sgom thabs med par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs med par bsam
12a5('bum): gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thobs med par shes rab sgom zhing de 'di snyam du sems/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni
12a6('bum): tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni tha thod pa sgom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/ bdag ni bsam gtan
12a7('bum): la snyoms par 'dug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni shes rab skem mo/ shes rab ni 'di skem mo zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom semasu bye
12a8('bum): bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de nul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed
12b1('bum): de bzod pa rlom go sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom ses
12b2('bum): su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom/ 
12b3('bum): sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom semasu byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par/ 
12b4('bum): rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste sbyin pa/ 'i pha ro ltad tu phyinang pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa' myed do// 
12b5('bum): ji ltar na de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag tshul khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
12b6('bum): de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar na de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
12b7('bum): phyi nad pa de ni pha rol tu phyinang pa med do// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi sa rang phyir / 
12b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gi pha
13a1('bum): pha rol tu phyi nang pa de ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di/ 
13a2('bum): ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha ro la tu phyi nang pa med pa'o// de ltar yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha
13a3('bum): rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu
13a4('bum): ma bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu ma bcwadang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 
13a5('bum): yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po ste/ nga ba nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
13a6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma
13a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yong su ma bzung
13a8('bum): nga gi mtshan nyi ma nyid kyis yongs su ma badrang / myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid kyis yongs sum bzung/ dngos po snyed bya stong pa nyid kyi kyi yongs sum bzung / ngobo nyid pos nyid kyis yong sus badz+ra/ 
13b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi
13b2('bum): rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / spobs rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam/ 
13b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzug/ 
13b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad par brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung
13b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongasu ma
13b6('bum): bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa
13b7('bum): bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes
13b8('bum): banyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
14a1('bum): mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byorang ji ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thams mkhas pas
14a2('bum): yongs su ma bzung / nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub
14a3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma ltung
14a4('bum): ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma
14a5('bum): ltung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ bsam ga/ na skom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan skem mo// shes rab sgom na bdag dang bdag
14a6('bum): gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de 'di snyam du ni/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni tshul
14a7('bum): khrims srung / tshul khrims ni 'di srung po zhes bya bar mi sems so/ bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar mi sems so/ bdag ni brtson 'grus chom mo// brtson
14a8('bum): 'grus na 'di rtsom mo zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/ zasam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar mi sems so/ bdag mi gas
14b1('bum): rdul tshunas rnam sems su mi ts+tshe/ rgyus khrings kyis rlom sems su mi byeng / bdag ni rgyal khrims dang ldan monas chos sems su mi byed do// bzod pa rlom sems smra mi byed/ 
14b2('bum): rnam sems su mi byeng / bdag ni 'azod pa dang ldan pa cwo zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// bcon 'grus rlom sems su mi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag na
14b3('bum): brtson 'grus pang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su byed do// bsam gtan rlom sems su mi b+had / gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan
14b4('bum): ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// shes rab rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyi rlom se mas su mi byed do// bdag shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar
14b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la med de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
14b6('bum): phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la med de/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni
14b7('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la med de/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa
15a1('bum): myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems casu byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la med de/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha rol tu phyinang/ 
15a2('bum): pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bsam gtan gi pha rol du tu phyind pa la med de/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa med pa
15a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la med de/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yin yang gang zag
15a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring du song ba shes shing pha ro/ lang shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su byed cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am
15a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
15a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ 
15a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid
15a8('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mi khye nad pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
15b1('bum): zhes rab kyi ba ro ba srinang pas yongs su bdung bas can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar mi rung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'gru par 'gyur ro// nang song ba nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas cam
15b2('bum): thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ 
15b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
15b4('bum): 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chen po stong
15b5('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgya sa kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi nga 'grub par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
15b6('bum): bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa raH/ 
15b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lu
15b8('bum): se/ rnam pa thams cad sa byinang pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar mi rung ste/ rnam pa tham po'i
16a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam
16a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dor ba su med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi snga 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
16a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mI ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub
16a4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma phreM/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid kyang 'phru
16a5('bum): par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyin stong pa nyid kyis yongs/ su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
16a6('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grus
16a7('bum): byar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur / 
16a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung stobs nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i
16b1('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
16b2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa le'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sor mi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su
16b3('bum): bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas nyan thos kyi
16b4('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thamasan cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnam ngas kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sa/ 
16b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung
16b6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ste/ 
16b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa zas/ 
16b8('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
17a1('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro bus ma gtan bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung sa/ rnam pa thams cad marjen pa shid byang grub
17a2('bum): nad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni
17a3('bum): yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ 
17a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs
17a5('bum): su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mya ltu/ teng ste/ rnam pa thams nang mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub pa/ ra 'gyur ro// rnam pa tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
17a6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa
17a7('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas
17a8('bum): nyan thos kyis 'ama'ang sangs rgyas kyisar mi rung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mi byin pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gdus kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyis 'bar
17b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar/ 
17b2('bum): myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yongs su bzung bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ 
17b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mgyis
17b4('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen pos so ngas su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sor mi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
17b5('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lung mi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
17b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thams cad
17b7('bum): shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mtshon pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// lam gi rnam pa zhes pa nyid kyis lo
17b8('bum): dazung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs pas can thos kyi
18a1('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa song drag
18a2('bum): brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa'o// // rab 'byor da de gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i shes rab
18a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pas yongs su bzung bas na thos kyi mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pas
18a4('bum): yongs su bzung bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yod sa su bzung ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu/ 
18a5('bum): bzung ba/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi stong / pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
18a6('bum): bzung ba/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sa yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
18a7('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba
18a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
18b1('bum): bzung ba sna dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
18b2('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba/ stobs rnams
18b3('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba
18b4('bum): bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ tshad med pa bzhis yo ngas su bzung ba/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nga bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par thard pa brgyad kyis/ 
18b5('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug sde pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo sto rnang pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pas yongs su/ 
18b6('bum): bzung ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ 
18b7('bum): bcus yongs su bzung ba/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa chen posnga yongs su bzung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs
18b8('bum): su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba
19a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas da mas surgyas kyisar myi ltung ngo // rab 'byor da ji ltar na gang bag byang chub sems
19a2('bum): dpa'i theg bya ba thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa thog mar thabs dang ldan par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs dang ldan
19a3('bum): par tshul khrims srung / thabs dang ldan par bzod pa sgom/ thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs dang ldan par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs dang ldan parwa shes rab
19a4('bum): sgom zhing 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / sbyin pa ni yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo snyam du myi sems// 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo/ 
19a5('bum): tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bang go ni bzod pa sgom mo/ bzod pa ni 'di skem mo snyam du myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rnam mo/ brdzun
19a6('bum): 'grus ni 'di brtsom mo snyam du mya semaso// 'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan nI dag la snyems par 'jug glo snyam du myi sems so/ 'di ltar bdag ni
19a7('bum): shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so// de sbyin pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag na sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed
19a8('bum): de tshul khrims rlom sems su myi byed/ rdul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de bzod pa rlom sems su mi myo bzod pa/ 
19b1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de brtson 'grus rlom sems su myi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems myi byed/ kIbartson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// 
19b2('bum): zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de bsam gtan rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de shes rab rlom semasasu myi byed
19b3('bum): shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de
19b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa de ni pha re lad tu phyind pa med pa'o/ de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lnga rnam par rtog pa
19b5('bum): de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ chu/ la khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa med/ drarko' ba'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
19b6('bum): pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol du tu phyinang ba med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi
19b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dril rnam par rtog pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol kyi phyi nang pa de ni pha rol kyi phyi nang pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas nga/ 
19b8('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag mid cade/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa de ni pha rol tu phyi nang pa med pa'o// de ltar de
20a1('bum): maklung pa nas pa'i dag par 'i nga sa nga / nga sa pa 'i na sanas da/ 
20a2('bum): yongs su rung dang / nas thams cad myong banyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su rung ba dang / rang gri man kyis yongs su rung ba dang / myi byigs paslo nyid kyis 'ongs su pabyung ba dang / ngos pad
20b1('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzod ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag/ 
20b2('bum): bar spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul ga rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan
20b3('bum): lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / 
20b4('bum): tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
20b5('bum): 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo slong ba nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar/ 
20b6('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzung / sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / mI 'jigs pa bzhis yo
20b7('bum): bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis/ 
20b8('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
21a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ 
21a2('bum): le'u sum bcu drug pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rje
21a3('bum): lar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lnga bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu bri nang pa la srab bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du tu phyi nad pa la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar babyed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slab
21a4('bum): bar bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa lnga spab bar bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa la slab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor du 'di la las dang po'i byang chub
21a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ba slab par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab
21a6('bum): par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes
21a7('bum): gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa stenang pa/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stonang pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
21a8('bum): pa stonang pa/ sbyin 'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ de dag la bsten par bya'o// bsnyen par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dri bya ste/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa gang dang gang
21b1('bum): pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ chur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ chur rigs
21b2('bum): kyi bu bzod pa gang dang gang bsgrub pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 
21b3('bum): byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ chur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams cad tha med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sos shig/ chur rigs kyi bu shes ra
21b4('bum): gang dang gang bsgom pa de rnams nad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su spos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na mid bya dayang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ 
21b5('bum): tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du shes su rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog/ par ma byed cig/ myig du rtog par ma byed cig/ rna bar rtog par ma
21b6('bum): byed cig/ snar rtog par ma byed cig/ lcer rtog par ma byed cig/ lus su rtog par ma byed cig/ yid du rtog par ma byed cig/ gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ sgrar rtog par ma byed cig/ drir rtog par
21b7('bum): ma byed cig/ rer rtog par ma byed cig/ reg du rtog par ma byed cig/ chos su rtog par ma byed cig/ myig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i rnam par
21b8('bum): shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i rnam par shes par ma byed cig/ lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ myig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma/ 
22a1('bum): byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par
22a2('bum): ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig
22a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis chos tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog por ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed/ 
22a4('bum): cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nod kyis tshor bar rtog pa ra ma byed cig/ rigs kyis bu khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig
22a5('bum): chu'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ me'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ nam mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes pa'i
22a6('bum): khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ ma rig par rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ ming dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ skye mched drug
22a7('bum): du rtog par ma byed cig/ reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sred par rtog par ma byed cig/ lend par rtog par ma byed cig/ srid par rtog par ma byed cig/ skye bar rtog par ma byed cig
22a8('bum): rga shir rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad par rtog par ma byed cig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ 
22b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad par rtog par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
22b2('bum): bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du rtog
22b3('bum): par ma byed cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig
22b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong nga pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ mtha' la rdzas 'das pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dor ba med pa stong pa
22b5('bum): nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtog/ bar ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rang gi mtshan nyid du stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed
22b6('bum): cig/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
22b7('bum): stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ yang dag par spong ba rnamasu rtog
22b8('bum): bar ma byed cig/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ dbang po rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ stobs rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog par ma/ 
23a1('bum): byed cig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par rtog par ma byed cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ chad myed pa bzhir to// 
23a2('bum): bar ma byed cig/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par thar pa brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rtog par ma byed cig/ 
23a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par rtog par ma byed cig/ mngon par shes pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ ting nge 'dzind rnams su rtog byar ma byed cig/ gzungs kyi sgo nas
23a4('bum): su rtog par ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog/ bar ma byed cig/ myi 'jigs pa bzhir rtog par ma byedacig/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig
23a5('bum): byams pa chen por rtog par ma byed cig/ snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya de du rtog par ma byed cig/ thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed
23a6('bum): cig/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
23a7('bum): tho par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du shes ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma btags
23a8('bum): pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig ni rnam pa thams cad
23b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma rtags pa'i sna ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag/ 
23b2('bum): pa'i lce ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa
23b3('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sgra ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
23b4('bum): ma brtags pa'i dri ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i ro ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dang / de nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg ni rnam
23b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma badz+ra gos pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba thams
23b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i rnam par shes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa
23b7('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
23b8('bum): byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ 
24a1('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams
24a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i gro mi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
24a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag pa'i myig gi 'dus
24a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
24a5('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag pa'i sna'i 'du sa te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtag pa'i lce'i dus te/ 
24a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed/ 
24a7('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skyon kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad ma nang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i sna'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
24a8('bum): bar byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mu'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad ma khyebyed pa nyid thob par byed do/ sa yengs su ma brtags pa'i me'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// 
24b1('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i rlung gi khams ni rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
24b2('bum): ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i ma rig pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs
24b3('bum): su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
24b4('bum): brtags pa'i mying dang gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye mched drug ni rnam pa thams nAng mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed/ 
24b5('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma/ 
24b6('bum): brtags pa'i sred pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i le nad pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma byartags pa'i srid
24b7('bum): pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend panyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rma ni rnam pa rnams
24b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
25a1('bum): tu phyi nad pa ni / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// 
25a2('bum): da yongs su ma brtags pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni rnam pa thams cad
25a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thos
25a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid ni
25a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa
25a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags
25a7('bum): ba'i 'dus stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtag/ 
25a8('bum): pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thod par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i thog mu dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa
25b1('bum): bred do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i dod pa med pa stong panyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyidang tho par byed do// yongs sum brtags pa'i ring bzhin stong panyid ni rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid thob pa/ 
25b2('bum): byed do// yongs sum brtags pa'i chos thams cad steng ba ni rnam pa thams cad ma byed panyid thob par byed do// yongs su rtags pa'i chos thams cad rang gi mnan nyid song ba'id ni rnam pa mas/ 
25b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni
25b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnams pa thamasacad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i
25b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
25b6('bum): thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad
25b7('bum): mkhyen po nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dbang po rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i stobs rnams ni rnam bya thams d+ha
25b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid theb par byed do// yongs sum ma gtags pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rnams pa thams cad ma khyenang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma rtogs por 'dzugs pa'i
26a1('bum): ma yan lag brna bani ma thams can can pa myod bar byedade/ yongs sum brtags pa'i dradre pa rnams ni rnam sa thams cadas ldan pazhi par byed de/ smos sum/ 
26a2('bum): rtags pa'i bsam gtan rnams ni rnam pa thams cad pabyind pa'id theb par byed do// yongs sum brtags pa'i tshad byed pa rnams ni nam mams cad ma khyen pa nyid mam par rjod de/ yongs sum
26a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i goms par drug pa rnams ni rnam pa rnams cang ma dren pa shing tho bar byed de/ yongs sum brnags pa'i rnam par ra ba bcad ni rnam pathams cad mkhyen du zhing
26a4('bum): rjes sum gagasapa'i sa rnas su 'du dru du da / sus papa'i ma
26a5('bum): ni stong pa nyid mu na ma myed pa dang slod pa myed pa ni rnam pa pa bcang babyed pazhid thob par byed do// yongs su su bcags pa'i mdon par bris pa rnams ni rnam pa thams par mkhyen pa
26a6('bum): thob bar byed do// yongs sum bdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dri rnam pa thams cad ma khyed panyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i gsus kyi skyernam sa ni rnam pa pams cang mkhyen pa'ing/ 
26a7('bum): thon bar rjod de/ yongs su ma bdags pa'i de bzhin gzugs pa'i stobs bcu ni rnam pa thams cad ma khyen panyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myi 'jigs pa bani ni rnam pa mas cad
26a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid theb par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i byams pa chen po ni rnam pa thams
26b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i snying rje chen ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni
26b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lam gi rna ba shes pa
26b3('bum): nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzugs la 'dod
26b4('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni/ gzugaso// rigs kyi bu tshor ba la 'dod pa ma spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni tshor ba'o// 
26b5('bum): rigs kyi du 'du shes la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni 'du shes so// rigs kyi bu 'du byed la 'dod/ ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa
26b6('bum): ba ni 'du byed do// rigs kyi bu rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// myig la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
26b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni mig go// rna ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni rna ba'o// sA la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
26b8('bum): med pa ni snga'o// lce la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lce'o// lus la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni lus
27a1('bum): yid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni yid do// gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzug so// sgra la 'dod/ 
27a2('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni sgra'o// dri la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa med pa ni dri'o// ro la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
27a3('bum): kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ro'o// reg la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'drid pa myed pa ni reg s+ho/ chos la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni chos so/ myig gi/
