99b7('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
99b8('bum): rolang tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par skem pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa phu
100a1('bum): sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgom pa rnams/ 
100a2('bum): sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
100a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzind sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom/ 
100a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa
100a5('bum): 'di ni/ myi 'jigs pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
100a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi nga pha rol tu phyin
100a7('bum): pa snom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
100a8('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa sgom pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lan
100b1('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
100b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub sgom pa rna bar
100b3('bum): sgom pa'o bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
100b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sgo pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byoradade de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byorang 'di lta ni ste/ shes
100b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byorarang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni tshor ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab
100b6('bum): 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni 'du shes sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni 'du byed sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
100b7('bum): rab 'byord 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni myig sgom pa rnam par
100b8('bum): sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam par snom pa'o// rab 'byorarang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sna sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
101a1('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce snyas pa rnam par sgom par/ rab 'byor 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni mus sgrum pa
101a2('bum): rnam par rnam par byu dzis/ shes kyi mang kyi pa ma pa dzin mi ma padas pa pa // ras nga 'dzis ste/ shes pa tha ro rnam
101a3('bum): gzugs snom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sgra sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101a4('bum): sgom pa 'di ni dri sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab
101a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni reg sgom pa rnam par sgo/ ma pa'o// rab 'byo rang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni chos sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
101a6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom po 'di ni myig gi rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di
101a7('bum): ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab
101a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
101b1('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni myig gi 'dus
101b2('bum): te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes
101b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom
101b4('bum): pa'o/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu dang phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byorarang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
101b5('bum): phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sgom pa sgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa sgom pa 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
101b6('bum): sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
101b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byorar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg bI rkyen kyis/ 
101b8('bum): tshor ba sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ 
102a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rke nad kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khas
102a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom po/ rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mye'i
102a3('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
102a4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
102a5('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di/ lte ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed/ 
102a6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo
102a7('bum): pa 'di ni mying dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
102a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pani reg pa sgom pa'o rnam pa sgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom par rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste shes rab
102b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shwe
102b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni skyo ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ 
102b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom po 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di
102b4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
102b5('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom
102b6('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pharol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor do 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
102b7('bum): phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni she can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
102b8('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
103a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa/ 
103a2('bum): rab 'byorarang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po sgom po rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor du 'di lta ste/ shes rab tus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i/ 
103a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di/ 
103a4('bum): lta steng shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzo dad pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab kyir 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson
103a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byo rang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa rnam par
103a6('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
103a7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste hUM
103a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor/ rang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rna ba bsgom
103b1('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa bsgom pa chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyis/ 
103b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pan/ 
103b3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bskor ba'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa ni mtha' las
103b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma drang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di
103b5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorarod 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
103b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang
103b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi dmyigs pa s+ho// 
103b8('bum): pa nyid sgom pa rna bar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi sa
104a1('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
104a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par/ 
104a3('bum): sdospong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
104a4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'de lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni sto bras bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab
104a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyir yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyang
104a6('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
104a7('bum): datu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'din pasam gtan sgom pa rnam par be sgos pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskum pa 'di ni med med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di la ste/ shes
104a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par tha dad pa bsgom / 
104b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma bar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol dutu
104b2('bum): nang ba bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu ston pa bskam pa 'di ni mngon par shes
104b3('bum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par thar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
104b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni gzunangs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab tu dbyor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdebs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par
104b5('bum): rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'gyu rang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni seMs
104b6('bum): yang dag par rig tho bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
104b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom par rna bar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ 
104b8('bum): zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam
105a1('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
105a2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab
105a3('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa rna bar
105a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la skad ces bka' stsol to// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mngon par
105a5('bum): chags pa myed dam zhes/ rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da/ pa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub ses
105a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la me ngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pe la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya// 
105a7('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu
105a8('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mngon par chags pa/ myed dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
105b1('bum): rjerje pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa la byang chub sos dpa'
105b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub sems
105b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' ses
105b4('bum): dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chag ngas pa myed dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b5('bum): dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub seMsadapa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' seMs
105b6('bum): dpa' chen pos yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par 'chags pa myed dam zhes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' seMs
105b7('bum): dpa' chen pos yong su rtag par bya'o// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
105b8('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a1('bum): dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
106a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'dus ma
106a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sesems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o/ 9/ rab 'byo rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags/ 
106a4('bum): pamyed dam zhes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dra pa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha
106a5('bum): mamyed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes thogam dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems te dpa' chen pos yong su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub
106a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon por chags pa myed dam zhes dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
106a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab
106a8('bum): 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su
106b1('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byorarung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lo mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106b2('bum): sa yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa
106b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos pa yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
106b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ nu po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
106b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid labyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// / rab 'byor dbyang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po myed pa'i
106b6('bum): de bo nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
106b7('bum): dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams laka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// 
106b8('bum): rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong bya rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rnaMs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs
107a1('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la byang chub seMs/ 
107a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dbang po rnams la byang chub sems
107a3('bum): dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
107a4('bum): pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga/ byang chub sa rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnamangs la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byang chub kyi yan lag rdzas la
107a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yong su rtog par bya 'od/ rab 'byo rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med
107a6('bum): dam zhes 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden
107a7('bum): pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yong su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas
107a8('bum): gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ bsam rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
107b1('bum): pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yong su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i
107b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byorang
107b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam par thard pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab
107b4('bum): 'byor ra da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa me dra dam zhes mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs la
107b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po rnams par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smom
107b6('bum): pa med pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa med byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rtag
107b7('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
107b8('bum): pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ting nge 'dzind rjes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
108a1('bum): bos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam/ zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
108a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed de/ 
108a3('bum): zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa rnams/ 
108a4('bum): la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes mi 'jigs pa rnams la ma dngon par chags pa med dam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems
108a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mdze na bar chags pa med dam/ zhes so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs
108a6('bum): su bteg par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam dzes na pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rtag par
108a7('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam// zhes snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu rtag par bya'o// 
108a8('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sos
108b1('bum): dpa' chen pos yongs su rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub ses
108b2('bum): dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang
108b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes rnam
108b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rtag par bya'o// / bam po/ 
108b5('bum): phyir myo ldog pa'i byang chub sems pa pa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa kha mo 'di la spyod pa'i che pha rol gyis smras pa dang // 
108b6('bum): kyis snyan pa la snying por lce 'am/ phyi myi ldog po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rolang gi dad pas myi 'gro 'am/ phyir/ 
108b7('bum): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang nga
108b8('bum): bcas pa'i sems skyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems skyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
109a1('bum): pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang bral bar ma gyur pa tam bzong pa'i pha rol tu phyirang
109a2('bum): pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam bsam rten gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral por ma/ 
109a3('bum): gyur da tam zhes yongs su rtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur/ 
109a4('bum): la zhum pa dang / yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nub par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zabamo 'di/ thos par dka' la thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la
109a5('bum): klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed lo de ba zhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha
109a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongasu dris shing yongasu brtag par byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
109a7('bum): lngar byang chub phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di 'chang pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi snang skrag par mi 'gyur lo/ zhum par mi 'gyur yongasu zhum
109a8('bum): mi 'gyur zhing / de'i ming phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang khong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun nub par byed de/ nul bzhin du yid la byid pa'i phyir ro// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub seM
109b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di snyan pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi snang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
109b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rna ba/ 
109b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la
109b4('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di lo rtog pa lagasadra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa rab 'byor da stong pa nyid
109b5('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin / rab 'byor nga mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
109b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byorang smon pa med pa la bzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
109b7('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ 
109b8('bum): rab 'byor nga skyo ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam/ 
110a1('bum): bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa
110a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'
110a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
110a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byo rang chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
110a5('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga yang dag pa'i ma tha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab
110a6('bum): mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin du rab
110a7('bum): 'byor nga bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga mdo
110a8('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga rmi lam la gzhol ba'i ba
110b1('bum): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byorang gzugs rnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
110b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byorang sgra rnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
110b3('bum): pa rab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab
110b4('bum): 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'dra
110b5('bum): de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa te zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur ba yin/ mtshan ma mye
110b6('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang
110b7('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
110b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ 
111a1('bum): mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' se chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo/ 
111a2('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rnyog par 'gyur/ 
111a3('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnal ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo/ dril rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i zas
111a4('bum): pas byang chub sems dbu' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ pha rol du phyinang pa rab mo 'di la brtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub ses
111a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
111a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
111a7('bum): pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par
111a8('bum): 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur ba/ gzugs rten la gzhol ba'i bsam/ 
111b1('bum): pas byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra snyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
111b2('bum): rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smig rgya la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la
111b3('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems da / 
111b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog para'agyur// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la/ 
111b5('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la ro// ga pa lags sam/ myig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la
111b6('bum): chog pa lags so/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa logs sam/ gzugs la rnyog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa la/ 
111b7('bum): sam dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam pa
111b8('bum): shes pa la tshig pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags saso/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags papa/ ming / 
112a1('bum): par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus rigs pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i/ 
112a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yin kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sams/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags so/ 
112a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags san lus kyi 'dus
112a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ mye'i
112a5('bum): khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa ra shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa
112a6('bum): lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes par la rtog pa lags sam/ mying dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags
112a7('bum): sam ta tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rdeg pa lags sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shis rtog pa lags sam
112a8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha ro lang du phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang du phyinang la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lo rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ro sang du byi/ 
112b1('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam can gyi pha rol du phyinang pa rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong banyid
112b2('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog
112b3('bum): pa lags sama'adus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha
112b4('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa nga stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyidapal rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog/ 
112b5('bum): pa legs sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa la gas sam/ mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lag sa sam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags so/ 
112b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
112b7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
112b8('bum): rtog pa lags sama'aphags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam brtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 
113a1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar/ 
113a2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la
113a3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma lags sam/ mi 'jig
113a4('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag pa dor rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags
113a5('bum): sam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa la gas sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba
113a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ 
113a7('bum): tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// myig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin
113a8('bum): ni sna la rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rtag pa ma yin no// lus la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ sgra la rtog pa ma yin no// dril rtog pa ma
113b1('bum): yin no// rol rtog pa ma yin no// reg la rtog pa ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 
113b2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 
113b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yino// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus
113b4('bum): te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis/ tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
113b5('bum): kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi
113b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin// mye'i kha
113b7('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du phye
113b8('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no// reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no tshor ba la rtog pa ma min/ 
114a1('bum): sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no// len pa la rtog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa
114a2('bum): ma yin no// tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam rten gyi
114a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma
114a4('bum): yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin/ 
114a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rnyog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tham myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la
114a6('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa
114a7('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nyes
114a8('bum): gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin/ stobs rjes
114b1('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ bas
114b2('bum): gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ 
114b3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la rtogs pa ma yin no// mngon par / 
114b4('bum): pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzinang rnams la/ rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yi ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 
114b5('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// 
114b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gri rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
114b7('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin po de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas gang nas kyang ma byas
114b8('bum): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs gang nas yang myi gnas yul gang na yang myi gnas/ gang na yang myi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs myi dmyigaso// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba myi phyin
114b9('bum): oM ma Ni pad me snyo mam mtsha yi ge la ldam kyo ma mas chi la
115a1('bum): so gang la grangs kyi dmyigs shing 'gro ba dang dong ba'i myi dmyigs pa de ni gang gis mngon par 'chang rgyu bar mi nus te// gzugs kyis ma yin no/ tshor bas ma yin no// du shes
115a2('bum): ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no/ rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ myig gis ma yin no// rnabs ma yin no// sdes ma yin no// sa ma yin no// lus kyis ma yin no/ yid kyis mi
115a3('bum): mi mo gzugs kyis seMn no// sgras ma yin no// dus ma sbyin no// ris ma yin no// reg gis ma yin no// chos kyis ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par
115a4('bum): bas ma yin no// sna'i rnams par shes pas ma yin no// skye rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no
115a5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// 'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma
115a6('bum): yon na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// myig gyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
115a7('bum): kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis nor bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas yin no// 
115a8('bum): khams kyis ma yino chu'i khams kyis ma yin no// mye'i khams kyis ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no/ nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin ma rig
115b1('bum): pas ma yin no/ 'du byed kyis ma yin no/ rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ na mying dang gzugs kyis ma yin no/ skye mched drug gis ma yin no// reg pas ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no
115b2('bum): skyed pas ma yin/ len pas ma yin no// srid pas ma yin no// skye bas ma yin no// rga shis ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi rang pas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas ma yin/ 
115b3('bum): bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyind pas ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas ma yin no// bsamatshan gau pha rolang tu phyinang pas ma yin no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pas ma yin no// 
115b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin don dam pa
115b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma ma na no 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa skyong
115b6('bum): pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yino// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no myi dmyigs
115b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rjes
115b8('bum): kyis ma yin no yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis mi yin/ dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no/ stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
116a1('bum): kyis ma yin no/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyang pas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no// chang myed pa rnams kyis ma yin
116a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ rnam par thard pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong
116a3('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyis mu yi nu no/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma yin no// de bzhin gsheg/ 
116a4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yino// byams pa chen pos ma yin no/ snying rje chen pos ma yin no// 
116a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rgyu nang tu/ zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yino// 
116a6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no/ lam gri rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nga pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir rer/ gzugs ni/ 
116a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// nor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ 'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cadas
116a8('bum): pa nyid do// myig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do/ snga nid kyang rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// kye nyid kyang rnam pa bams
116a9('bum): 'du byed nyid kyang rnaM ba thos cad mkhyen pa nyid do
116b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ lus ring kyang rnam pa thams cad ma byer pa nyid de/ yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid do/ gzugs ni kyang rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid do/ smrani kyang / 
116b2('bum): rnam pa sems cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ drin kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pazhid do// ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid do/ reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa zhid do/ chos nyi
116b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ sna'i rnam par/ 
116b4('bum): shes pa nyid kyang rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenadu/ 
116b5('bum): pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid do/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa mas cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
116b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ snga'i 'dus te reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
116b7('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
116b8('bum): nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// sngo'i 'dus te rerig pa'i rgya rang kyis tshor banyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pazhidang/ bre'i 'dus na / 
117a1('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams ma khyedang pa nyid de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
117a2('bum): kyis tshar ba'i kyang ma pa sams cid mkhyed dupa'i dang // pa'i khams nyid kyang ram pa rnams cad sa bye nga ba nyidang / ru'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa zhid nga / phyi mi khams dang / 
117a3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid do/ rlung gi khams nyid kyi dra rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyi
117a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa
117a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mying dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ reg pa nyid kyang rje ba thams cad ma
117a6('bum): pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid do// len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thas cad
117a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ga nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nus rje/ 
117a8('bum): kyim mang byi pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid nga/ 'ang pa'i pa sa phyi nga pa'i kya rnam pa sems pa ma byod pa zhing / kyor 'grus kyi pa mang du pyi rang pazhi kyang rnam pa thams
117b1('bum): pa nyi dang / bsam gtang gi pa ro yang du phyinang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa'ing ngo // shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid do/ nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cangs kyi
117b2('bum): pa nyid rdo phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid spong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang
117b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo / don dam pa stong po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams ca
117b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
117b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid ste/ 
117b6('bum): panyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa sku nga pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
117b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba rjes kya
117b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do/ rdzu 'phrul gi nang ba rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang po rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid de/ stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ 
118a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid
118a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam nyan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid do// chang med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par dun
118a3('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam par tharang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
118a4('bum): pa nyid dri/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mchar ma myed pa dang smo nang pa myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thas
118a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid do/ ting nge 'dzinang nyid kyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs gi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
118a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byams pa chen gyi
118a7('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rdo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// de ci'i
118a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
118b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang gang yind pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
118b2('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi nang pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
118b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyin gcig pa'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
118b4('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
118b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin// pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin// pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid rtsig
118b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de za zhin nyid gang yind pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de ba'i
118b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
118b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid rtsig pa'o// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid/ 
119a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bzhin
119a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid
119a3('bum): glang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thos
119a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyidagacig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ngo/ rten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
119a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyin gcig pa'o// 
119a6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi rna bar shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rje ba
119a7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
119a8('bum): cig pa'o rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rdza ba zas
119a9('bum): lus kyi rna bar shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
119b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
119b2('bum): gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rlom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig por/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhi nyid gang yi
119b3('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ 
119b4('bum): kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
119b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thamasad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid kyis
119b6('bum): ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
119b7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i dri
119b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de banod nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen
120a1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang zhen pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chu'i khams kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid cig
120a2('bum): mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams ha cang mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
120a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
120a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyi dang gcig pa'o/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna
120a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de ba zhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ 
120a6('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mying ga
120a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
120a8('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang po nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i ngo
120b1('bum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
120b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga/ 
120b3('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// len pa'i ngo bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nying gang yin pa
120b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig bla/ 
120b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye dang pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i de bzhin
120b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi nge ba/ zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba thams
120b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
120b8('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
120b9('bum): rolang du phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thas cad/ 
121a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ 
121a2('bum): dadi dri bzhin nyid gcig par/ rang snang pa nyid kyi brji nyi gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa 'a da pa nyid kyid bzhin zhing gang srid pa ni de bzhin nyid gcig par/ spong bzhi stong pa
121a3('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa
121a4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi// 
121a5('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyidagang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus
121a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gdu smin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba thams
121a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// thog ma dang tha mi myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
121a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dnga'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'o rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi
121b1('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi
121b2('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'i/ 
121b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
121b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi skad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ 
121b5('bum): bya nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang smi/ 
121b6('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ya
121b7('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rdzas kyi de bzhin nyid gang
121b8('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
122a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhinani gcig pa mo gongs rnams kying bzhi shing gang mi pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyad pa nyid kying bzhin nying gang yin pa don de bzhin nyid gcig par/ byung dru
122a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyi gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yang lag rgyang ba'i de bzhi nyi pa
122a3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
122a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam ka/ ngan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams rta n+ya nga mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
122a5('bum): pa chad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug
122a6('bum): rnams kyi pasnyen nyi dgang mir ba dang / rnam ma byams cad sa 'do pa nyid kyi bzhi shing gang mang bdod pa'i dashing gcig pa'o// ma par tharang pa rnams kying pazhi shing gang yod pa dang / rnam pa mam
122a7('bum): paskyenang pa nyid kyi de ba'i mning ga yin pa ri bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mabar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par chug pa dag 'a bzhi shing gang yid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid kyi de bzhim dun na
122a8('bum): nga ga nyid nyid gcig pa// rnam par bar pa'i gri snying pazhid dang / mtshanam byed pa dang rlung pa byed pa'i di bzhi seMng gang yi pa dang / rnam pa thams cad sa khyed pod dkyi pa'i shing gang mi pa
122b1('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
122b2('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
122b3('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myi 'jigs pa
122b4('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye don pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
122b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa deni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
122b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
122b7('bum): pa brno rgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab / bam po// / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / 
122b8('bum): gzugs yod par spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi/ lha rdzas kyi can dang gi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu ta dang / pun da rig mang po khyer te/ phyogs cig du 'khod / 
122b9('bum): rna ba thos cad mkhyen pa nyid ki de ba'i nyid gang yin pa
123a1('bum): com ldan sa pa gsu ba gyu/ mas lam lda sa / las sus smras kyi sa sa ba
123a2('bum): 'khod do phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
123a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
123a4('bum): kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
123a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid 'du shes/ 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du byed de rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa
123a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig go/ rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rje ba thas
