123a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// snga nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
123a8('bum): kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus/ yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid do// gzug
123b1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugaso// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgra nyid do// dri nyid rnam pa thos
123b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa mkhyen ba nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'od kyang rna ron/ reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad/ 
123b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
123b4('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenand pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa
123b5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam pa/ ra shes pa nyid rje ba thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen
123b6('bum): pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma lnga rang pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa
123b7('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa s+ho/ rna ba thams cad ma
123b8('bum): pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thas cad mkhyen
124a1('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg
124a2('bum): pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skye/ rna ba tham/ 
124a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
124a4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cho rab nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'as
124a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sde rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg bri rkyend kyis tshor ba 'o/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyud kyis cir dran
124a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rno ba thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ 
124a7('bum): kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed / 
124a8('bum): tshor ba'o sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sa'i khamaso/ chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chu'i
124b1('bum): khams so daskye'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cang babyed pa bre/ rnam pa thams cad ma bya dang ba zhing thang mo'i khams/ rlung gi khams nyid rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad sa bye
124b2('bum): rlung pa/ ra la 'i yas nyid rnam pa rnam pan du / rnam pathams cad sa byung pa nyid kyang ram ma'i mas so// rnam pa gas 'i 'dzis nyid rnam pa thams cad paston pa
124b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyang rnam pa gas pa'i 'am tho/ ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad po khyenang pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma byi nang pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa rnams ni
124b4('bum): bkye dag sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyeng pa nyid kyang du byedad/ rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma skyen pa ste ra rnam pa mas cadas myed pa nyid kyang rlom pa shes pa mang
124b5('bum): gzugs nying rnam pa thams cad mkhyer ngomo nyid kyang myong ngan zhugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ 
124b6('bum): banyi ma pa mas dun pa kri/ mam ma das kyis shing kyi ga / ri bathaMng ngas pa rnams pas kyang pas/ rnam pa rnams congs khyed pa
124b7('bum): banying rngub pa thams cad mkhye ba ma rnam pa thams cad bakhye nad pa'i tha spyang ba'i/ leng ba'i darnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi/ 
124b8('bum): len pa'i/ srid pa nyid rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'i/ skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
125a1('bum): skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rga shi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
125a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyirang pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
125a3('bum): pa'o bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi
125a4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam btan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
125a5('bum): pa nyid kyang bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
125a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ byi spong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mnyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa
125a7('bum): nyid / phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gyi nang stong nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer ba ste/ rnam pa thams sa
125a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad sa khyer pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong panyid do// do dam pa stong pa ni rnam pazla
125b1('bum): cang mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngon dam pa stong ba nyid do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas
125b2('bum): spyong pa nyid do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer bu saM/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong bzhid // mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid rnam pa rnamasas
125b3('bum): mkhyen de ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
125b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam
125b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa 'o da rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye
125b6('bum): banyid kyang ches sems cad stong zhing de/ rang gi ma tshan nyid skye sa da rnam pa thams cad sa khye ba ste/ rnam pathams cad ma khyen dab zhid kyang dgi sa maud snang pa 'id ngo// byi dmyigs pa stong/ 
125b7('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i
125b8('bum): kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thos
126a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
126a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnam so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
126a3('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnam so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dbang po rnam so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
126a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stobs rnamaso// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamaso// 'phags pa'i lam
126a5('bum): yan lag rgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa tham/ shes cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rje ba than
126a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ bsaman nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ske/ rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid kyang bsam rten rnams// chang med pa nyid rnam pa tham
126a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chad med pa rnams// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
126a8('bum): snyoms par 'dug pa rnams so// rnam pa thams rang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa nyid rje/ 
126b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma skyed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
126b2('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
126b3('bum): nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnam so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnamaso// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
126b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams// mi 'jigs pa
126b5('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi de kyang myi 'jigs pa rnamaso// so so yang dag rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang so so/ 
126b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams/ byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad me khyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
126b7('bum): mamakhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'i/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kang rnam sa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang sbyin
126b8('bum): padang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar skyed do/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
127a1('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
127a2('bum): nyid gcig paste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis skye/ 
127a3('bum): cing gnyi su byar myed do/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myedad myin/ 
127a4('bum): gi de bzhin nyid gong yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
127a5('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rje ba thams cad
127a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa sre/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do/ lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
127a7('bum): nyid gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar med do/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa rnyed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ 
127a8('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
127b1('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyi su byar myed do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid rtsig pa skye/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar myed do// 
127b2('bum): sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rno ba thams
127b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
127b4('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyi su byer med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yi/ na pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga dang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing
127b5('bum): gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi sa su med cing gnyi su byar med do/ myig gi rna bar shes pa'i
127b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
127b7('bum): yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar myed do/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams
127b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar myed do/ lce'i rna rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi/ 
128a1('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga/ 
128a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gong yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
128a3('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su bar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing / 
128a4('bum): gnyis byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang charnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// sna'i
128a5('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ni/ 
128a6('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gin ga pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyisu byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
128a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de// 
128a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de nod kyi su tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
128b1('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa sted pa
128b2('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
128b3('bum): su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar myed do// 
128b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa rang dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// yid kyi
128b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de ba/ zhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar myong/ sa'i khaMs/ 
128b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i che mas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
128b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar myed do/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
128b8('bum): gnyisu myed cing gnyisu byer myed do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// sa
129a1('bum): ma ma pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ning gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su bskyed cing gnyis byar byed de/ rnam par shes na
129a2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyi gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu myed cing gnyis su byar med de/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
129a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid/ 
129a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byamyed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
129a5('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyisu myed cing gnyis byar myed de/ mying dang gzun kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing
129a6('bum): gnyis byar myed do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar myed do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid/ 
129a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad bzhin pa nyid kyi bzhin nying gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar byed nga / tshor ba'i bzhin ning gang song ba dang / rnam pa thams cing
129a8('bum): gan kyi pa nyid nyi gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis myed cing gnyis byar byed // sred pa'i da ba 'di de dgang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa nyid kyi pa ning gang yin par ring bzhi 'i
129b1('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyisu myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis kyi
129b2('bum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thos
129b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
129b4('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byed med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
129b5('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar me da do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
129b6('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi
129b7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ni
129b8('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bsam brtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid ga pa yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su
130a1('bum): myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing 'i// 
130a2('bum): su byar myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
130a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste te/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad/ 
130a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de rang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de gi
130a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su med cing ga nyi su byar med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin// pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
130a6('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar myed do/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / bzhin nyid gcig po ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
130a7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis byar myed de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa snyed gci
130a8('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi da bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ra bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni pa'i nying gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing ga'isu byar na
130b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni nga bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// thog ma dang tham med
130b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyi su byar med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
130b3('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyi su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
130b4('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
130b5('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rang gi mtshan/ nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
130b6('bum): ste gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
130b7('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byur med do// 
130b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// dngos po myed pa'i bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
131a1('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar ba myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
131a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par stong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad
131a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/ 
131a4('bum): srid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ri nga bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis byar myed de/ dbang po rnams kyi ngo da pazhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi da
131a5('bum): zhing gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa / gnyis myed cing gan su byar med do/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin ni / rdzang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga
131a6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar myed do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin/ 
131a7('bum): gcig pa ste gnyi su med cing gnyi su byer myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yon lhag rgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa skyed
131a8('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed ni
131b1('bum): gnyis su byar med/ bsam brtan rnams kyi de bzhin nid gang min pa dang / rnam pa thams cad sa myed pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang mi ba da ni pa ni zhing gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byur myed d+he nang / 
131b2('bum): med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'a
131b3('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar myong/ rnam par tha da pa rnams kyi de bzhin
131b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa/ nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyi su byar myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyas
131b5('bum): par 'dug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa de ring drin na nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// rje par
131b6('bum): tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis/ 
131b7('bum): med de/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhid nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ning bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu mang cing gnyis byar byed/ ting nge 'dzin rnam kyi
131b8('bum): dad na gang med pa dang / rnam pa yang bdas byed pa byed bye pa 'ad de dgang yin pa nga 'di ga ga paskye/ ga su bang ci ga su byar medang/ gsus kyi sgo rnams kyi ba nga gang ming pa dan
132a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cadam
132a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
132a3('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu/ 
132a4('bum): med cing gnyis byar med do// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cig gnyis su byar med do// snying rje/ 
132a5('bum): chen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nying gcig pa snyed gnyis te/ med cing gnyis byar myed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
132a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad me khyend pa nyid kyi de binA na nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su cing gnyis su byar med do/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
132a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
132a8('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar myed do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'dra bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
132b1('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar med do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
132b2('bum): su byar myed do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar myed do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de ba'i
132b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thos
132b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar med do/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras dbu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de
132b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing ga nyi su byar myed do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
132b6('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar myed do// 
132b7('bum): byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thos
132b8('bum): cid mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni re
133a1('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su byar myed do// zhes stonang pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di zab cing lta dka' la/ khong du chud
133a2('bum): par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhi bcing mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
133a3('bum): kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
133a4('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
133a5('bum): pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma na pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa s+ho// 
133a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa steng/ rnam pa
133a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang snga'o// lce nying rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du/ 
133a8('bum): nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khye nang pa nyid kyang lus/ ying 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyang mi / 
133b1('bum): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugaso// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa/ 
133b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kya ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
133b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
133b4('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ste/ po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes
133b5('bum): pa'o snga'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa ste rjem
133b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi
133b7('bum): par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thos
133b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
134a1('bum): rnam pathams cad sa khyed pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa shing kyang gA'i 'dus te dag par/ 'i 'dus pa rig pa zhing rnam pa thams cad sa kyad pasna/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa
134a2('bum): da ste'i du / lus kyi rgyus ti dag pa nyid rnam du rnams chung ba skyed kyi ste/ rnam parnams cad sa byung bzhi mas kyi dus rig par/ yid kyi 'dus ga pa'i rnam parnam
134a3('bum): chang mkhye ra pa nid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhing rnam pa thams cad mi khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus de rig pa'i rkyen
134a4('bum): kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang kyi das nor ba'i nyid rnam pa thams mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cho
134a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rje ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
134a6('bum): tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ra/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thas na
134a7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid kyang mus kyi dus te rig pa'i gyi rang kyis tshor bar// ming kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ra ba nyid rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa srid rnam pa'i
134a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams/ chu'i khams ni
134b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyin pa nyid kyang chu'i khamaso/ mye'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khamaso// rlung gi khros
134b2('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i
134b3('bum): kham so rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i kham so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
134b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du byed// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa
134b5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i/ mying dang gzug sa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugaso// skye mched drug nyid
134b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid skye mched drug/ reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba ni
134b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa zas
134b8('bum): cad mi byind pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
135a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang smra ba'o// rga shi nyi rnam thathams cad mkhyen du pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nashi'o// sbyin pa'i pha'o mang du phyin pa zhi rnam pa thams
135a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'o// tshul khris kyi pha rolang du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / 
135a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyinang pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
135a4('bum): tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa tham/ das cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o/ bsam brtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
135a5('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shA
135a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
135a7('bum): cad ma khyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ 
135a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de/ chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa mas cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa'i/ 
135b1('bum): rnam mamams ca ma bye pa ste/ rnam pa mas sadas byed pa nyi kyang ngas pa slong ba'i dang / dus byas stong banyid dam pa thams cad sa byed sa pa rnam par thams cadas byed pa nyid kyang du
135b2('bum): byas sreng pa'i dang / nus ma byas sring pa'id rnam pa mas cangam byed pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa spong banyid rnam pa thams cadas
135b3('bum): bste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang thog ma dang / 
135b4('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid de/ dor ba myong ba stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
135b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// sa thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid
135b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mying myigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thos
135b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thos
135b8('bum): cad ma byed pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen panyid kyang ngo ba 'ing spong ba'i dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyedang pa nyid kyang dngos po me
136a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran panye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/ yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa
136a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rngam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rjes
136a3('bum): dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dbang po rnam so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kya stobs rnams ni
136a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamaso// daphags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa nyid rna ba thams cad mkhyen
136a5('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ba/ 
136a6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam brtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam brtan rnam so// tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
136a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chad myed pa rnam so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ste
136a8('bum): rnams/ rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par thar da pa rnamaso/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa nyid rnam pa thams
136b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa nyid dade rnam pa
136b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa
136b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid
136b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa / nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa/ 
136b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mas so// myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen / ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs
136b6('bum): rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad
136b7('bum): mkhyen bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs/ 
136b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad po khyed ba ste/ rnam pa thams tshang sa khyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// 
137a1('bum): shes rab / bam po// / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
137a2('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// 'du
137a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed de/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gong yin pa dang / 
137a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
137a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gci ga pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do/ myig gi ngo ba/ bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba'i
137a6('bum): ni gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis skye nga gnyis su byar med do// rdza ba'i bon monong gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad sa byudang pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa de ni bzhin ni
137a7('bum): gcig pa sre/ gnyis myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// sngo di bzhin zhing gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang min pa drin de bzhin 'ad gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis / 
137a8('bum): byar myed do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang
137b1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid bcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
137b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
137b3('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa skye/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
137b4('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam rapa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi dan nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// ro'i
137b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su/ myed cing gnyis su byar med do// rig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da / 
137b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin po dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhi
137b7('bum): nyi gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
137b8('bum): deni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byer myed do/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nying sbyin
138a1('bum): pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su myed
138a2('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su phyir myed do// lus kyi rnam
138a3('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa dani thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i/ 
138a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su me rad cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhi
138a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin// nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mi da cing gnyis su byar myed do/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhi
138a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byer myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
138a7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams par mkhyen po nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang ljin pa de ni dri bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mye cing gnas su byar byed do// sde'i 'dus te dag pa'i de ba'in nyid gang yin pa dang / 
138a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyong bzhin ning gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa sri/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i da bzhi na nying gang yin pa dang rnam pa zas sa
138b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byer myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi/ 
138b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de rnying bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
138b3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa sre/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnardza ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
138b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gci dag pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
138b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de/ bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin
138b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin
138b7('bum): nyid ga yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis nor ba'i de bzhin
138b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnapa
139a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhye
139a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gang yin pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
139a3('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
139a4('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar med do// nam ma kha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid cig/ 
139a5('bum): pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes/ pa'i de khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
139a6('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi sa byar myed de/ ma rig pa'i ro bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
139a7('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gong yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnab
139a8('bum): shes pa'i 'tshor khyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar myed do// mying dang gzungs/ 
139b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// skye mchen drug gi de bzhin nyid gang
139b2('bum): yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ rnyog po'o de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thos
139b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ nor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
139b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi ngas su myed cing gnyis byar myed do/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/ dpa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
139b5('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid cig
139b6('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gong yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gin
139b7('bum): su byar myed de/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid
139b8('bum): yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
140a1('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid/ 
140a2('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
140a3('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam
140a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de ba ni ngan nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
140a5('bum): pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i de bzhinan
140a6('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar mya da de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
140a7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i
140a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de cin
140b1('bum): nyid gcig pa skye// gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
140b2('bum): su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis/ 
140b3('bum): byar myed do// don dam po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do 'dus
140b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenand pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// 'dus ma byas stong
140b5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend/ pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byor myedado/ mtha' las 'das
140b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
140b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de
140b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
141a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa/ 
141a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
141a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
141a4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis gnyisu byar myed do// dngo rjes po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
141a5('bum): gnyi su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi da gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi da gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su byar myed
141a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyisu byar myed do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de
141a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
141a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo
141b1('bum): bzhin ning gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myad do// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyi su
141b2('bum): byar myed do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de
141b3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
141b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi dan nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'pha gas pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad
141b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bsam brtan rnam sa kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi re/ 
141b6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar med do// chad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi
141b7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste na gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
141b8('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ri nga bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
142a1('bum): su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid rtsig/ 
142a2('bum): pa ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo srong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
142a3('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar myed do/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhi ni nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gzhi
142a4('bum): su byar byed de/ ting 'dzidang rnams kyang bzhin nyid grang yin pa rnam pa thams cad pakhye nang pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa da ni de bzhin nyid gcig sa / gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byam
142a5('bum): myeng / gzus kyi sgo rnams kyi dba'i na'i gang yin pa ngarnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa rjo rje bya bzhin ning gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis par myong
142a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myi 'jigs pa
142a7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nying gcig pa ste nga gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
142a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// snying rje chen po'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rngub thams ca
142a9('bum): byamos pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin po dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ngabrin nying gcig pa stom gnyis myed cing gnyis byar mying ngo // 
142b1('bum): mkhan pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
142b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
142b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
142b4('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su bya/ ra myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
142b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar/ myong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
142b6('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su myed do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
142b7('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rangasas rgyas kyi ngo bzhon nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar gying
142b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su myed cing gnyis byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi de
143a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pu ste gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas de/ 
143a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las chud pa la thugs gzhol to// chos ston pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad mkhyend kyi chos byang chub 'di na zab cing
143a3('bum): lhalta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing rtag tu myed la/ brtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ 
143a4('bum): de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te// gang la gnyi ngos su kun nas rgyu ba myed pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid/ 
143a5('bum): lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo// lha'i bu// dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i drug chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po lha'i bu dag yang dag
143a6('bum): mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu myed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag 'a
143a7('bum): ba dang 'gro ba bab pa'i phyir chos kyi 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag mi skye ba'i byugag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa'i phyir chos 'di bab bo// lho'i bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa/ 
143a8('bum): dang rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa bab pa'i phyir chos 'di rab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par byang chub pa byed pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa zaban/ 
143b1('bum): bri chos 'din po/ pa'i bu dag pa garab pa'i phyir chos 'dri rab bo// lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i dag srog phab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab zo/ lha'i bu dag
143b2('bum): ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ 
143b3('bum): lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i blo dag byed pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nor ba po zab pa'i
143b4('bum): phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chordzas 'di zab bo/ lho'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po lha'i bu
143b5('bum): dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du she/ sa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa 'i phyir chos 'ang zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab
143b6('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo lha'i bu dag myig zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos
143b7('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab po/ lha'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab po/ lha'i bu dag ska ba po'i phyir
143b8('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag ro zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri rab bo// lha'i bu dag rig papa pa'i phyir chos 'di thob bo/ lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir ches 'di bab po/ 
144a1('bum): ca lnga'i bu dag myig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rab bo// lha'i bu dag rngab lo rnam par shes bathob pa'i phyir nas 'di bab po/ lha'i bu dag snga'i rnam par shes pa rab pa'i phyir chos 'dri rab po// 
144a2('bum): lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag myin/ 
144a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dog sA'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i
144a4('bum): phyir 'ad bye bo/ lnga'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te rag pa zab pa'i phyirachos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
144a5('bum): tshor ba rab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus pa ba'i skyond kyis tshor bzab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rab pa'i phyir chos 'di rang
144a6('bum): lha'i bu dag su'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyund kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di ma marlonaskye'i bu dgra lus kyi 'dus rig pa'i rkye nad kyis nar ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di 'be bo/ lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te rig po'i rkyen kyis
144a7('bum): tshor ba rab pa'i phyir tshus 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sa'i khams zab po'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ sgo'i bu dag nu'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab bo/ lha'i bu dag mye li ngas zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lnga'i bu dag
144a8('bum): rlung gi khams 'bo pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nam mo khwa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lho'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos/ 
144b1('bum): 'di zab po lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ chu lnga'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab po'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ rtswa lha'i bu dag mying dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag skye mched drug zab pani
144b2('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dge tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'a
144b3('bum): thob po lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dge skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rolang du phyinang pa zab po'i phyir/ 
144b4('bum): chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag chu lo khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa breb dro'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dge bzod pa'i pha rol du ste nad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'ang zab bo/ lha'i bu dag rtson 'grus kyi pha
144b5('bum): ri yang du phyi nang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rab po/ lha'i bu dge bas mu'i brtson gyi pha ra lang du phyi nad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po lnga 'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rolang du byinang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rnas
144b6('bum): sgra'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid thod pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab po// lha'i bu dag phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab zo/ lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid babasti
144b7('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rab mo/ lha'i bu dag do ngas pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri bab blo/ lnga'i bu dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid rab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// 
144b8('bum): spyi'i bu dag 'dus ma byas stong pa da rab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bro// 'i bu dag mtha' mas 'das pa slong pa zhing rab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag zag ma dang sa ma byed pa stong ba nyid rna ba'i phyir chos 'dzin
145a1('bum): lha'i bu dag dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab yod/ 
145a2('bum): lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu/ 
145a3('bum): dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa/ lha'i bu dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar gzhog pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo lha'i bu dag
145a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rdzu 'phrurol gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag dbang po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag stobs zab pa'i phyir chos
145a5('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za ba po/ lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa zab pa/ 'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab bI/ 
145a6('bum): phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag bsam brtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag chad myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po//
