267a2('bum): phyir ldog go/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'du shos las phyir ldog go// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go// phyir mi 'ong po'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ 
267a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go// rang byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go// nyan thos kyi 'du shes la phyir/ 
267a4('bum): ldog go// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go// byang chu pa sems dpa'o 'du shes las phyir ldog go// sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
267a5('bum): 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid byang chub sems da pa'i skyon myed par 'jug ste/ des chos rdul tsam
267a6('bum): yang dmyigs pa myed do// dmyigs pa myed pas/ mngon par 'du myi byed do// mngon par 'du mi byed pas/ skye ba myed de/ de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
267a7('bum): dpa' chen po mi skyo ba la/ bzod pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar/ rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
267a8('bum): chen po ni/ phyir mi ldog par/ rig par bya'o// 'phags pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bani bcu pa'o// 
267b1('bum): bam po // rab 'byorang gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
267b2('bum): po'i drung du bdud sdig to camanye bar 'ongs te/ mos pa zlog cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'di ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o// chos 'a
267b3('bum): ngag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o// de ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
267b4('bum): stong pa la gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / gang gis ma dngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa dang / gang mngon par rdzogs ra par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang myi dmyigs te/ 
267b5('bum): chos 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po myed pa'i/ ngo bo nyid myed de/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
267b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa de khyod nyon mongs pa la don myed par 'gyur te/ 'di ni bdud kyis bstan pa'o// 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no// rigs
267b7('bum): kyi bu yid la byed pa de dag mthong la/ khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang phan pa myed par ma spyod cig/ sdug bsngal ba dang log par ltung ngo zhes zer na/ de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshig
267b8('bum): de dag zas nas 'di ltar yongs su rtag par bya ste/ de ltar bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las zlog pa de ni/ bdud lhas ste/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang bachung
268a1('bum): pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi de dag sems can rnams kyis ma shes ma mthong / khong du ma chud kyis de'i phyir bdag gis nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ 
268a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i go cha bgos te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la sems can thams cad la 'byung ba'i chos ston to// 
268a3('bum): sems can rnams rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid// 
268a4('bum): la rab tu dgod par bya'o// rang byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o// tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rab tu dgo/ dad par bya'o snyam du sems skyed cig/ de la byang chub sems dang / 
268a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung sa/ chos de dag thos na sems brtan par bya'o// sems myi ga yo bar bya'o// sems mi 'phrogs par bya'o// de sems bstan
268a6('bum): pa dang / sems mi g.yo ba dang / sems mi 'phrogs pa de dang ldan pas/ pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su drug la spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
268a7('bum): 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ci lags bcom ldan 'das slar mi ldag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba 'am/ 'on dang sku
268a8('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// phyir ldog
268b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ni phyir myi ldog pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhe na slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyir ldog pa zhes bgyi/ ci'i slad du slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems
268b2('bum): dpa' la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir ldog pa de ni/ rab 'byor da phyir
268b3('bum): lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las mi ldog pa de ni rab 'byor
268b4('bum): phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ phyir ldog pa zhe nyes bya'o/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag ngasus de dag dang mtshanas de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po bya/ 
268b5('bum): mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o ste/ rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang mnan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can gis bla na myed pa yang
268b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus so// rab 'byor de gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem po ni 'dod na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// 
268b7('bum): byams gtan gnyis po lamams par 'dug go// bsam gtan gsum pa la skams par 'jug s+ho/ bsam gtan can pa la snyams par drug go/ byams pa la snyoms par 'dug sa
268b8('bum): gamang nga 'jug so// dga' ga la rnams par 'jug go/ bang rnams la rnams par 'jug go/ nam ma la ma pa' sas sgra ma ched la sems par 'jug go// rnamags sa kyi
269a1('bum): nangs na ka myed smras nas gams par 'dug pa/ rgyugs myang 'dugs byed kyin skye mamed la gas par 'jug pa 'a 'gag par mams par 'dzug pa ma sa/ 
269a2('bum): par 'jug go// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go// yang dag par spong ba bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go// 
269a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug gi/ dbang po lnga la snyoms par 'jug go/ stobs lnga la snyoms par 'jug go/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la snyoms par 'jug go// 'phags pa'i
269a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la snyoms par 'jug go// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom ngas par 'jug go/ mngon par shes pa lnga la snyoms par 'jug go/ 
269a5('bum): de bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs mya/ pa'i snyos par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gis 'gog pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa la 'dris par byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa brta/ 
269a6('bum): goms par byed/ yang dag par spang ba bzhi goms par byed/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi goms par byed/ dbang po lnga goms par byed/ stobs lnga goms par byed/ byang chub kyi lan lag bdun goms
269a7('bum): byad/ 'omags thamamamaldan lag sartan pa thams par byed/ ma pa ny-id dang canas kyad pa dang / na pa med pa nga 'dzidi la gas byu zugs/ bsam gtan gyi lus rnam sa
269a8('bum): chad byed pa'i 'bras bu mangs su mi 'dzin te/ gzugs byed pa rnams par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su phyi 'dzin to// 'gog pa ra rnams par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su su 'dzin to/ 
269b1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongasasu myi 'dzin to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin to// na cigs/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin to// dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin / 
269b2('bum): te/ rang byang chub thob par mi byed do// de nas ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to// lus gang gi sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin to// rab 'byor rnam pa de
269b3('bum): ngag dang rdul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
269b4('bum): chen po ni byang chub yid la byed pa dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing gzugs lhur len pa ma yin/ mtshan ma lhur lend pa ma yin/ lus lhur len pa ma yin/ sbyin pa
269b5('bum): lhur len pa ma yin/ tshul khrims lhur len pa ma yin/ bzod pa lhur len pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus lhur len pa ma yin bsam gtan lhur lend pa ma yin/ shes rab lhur len
269b6('bum): bi ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ rtse stong pa nyid lhur lo nod pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid lbu kha nad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
269b7('bum): spur len pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa sa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lhur lend pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa spyong pa/ 
269b8('bum): nyid lhur lend pa ma yin/ zlog ma dang bla ma myed pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa/ 
270a1('bum): nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lhur lend pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ dngas pa myed pa stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin// 
270a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa lhur len pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba lhur len pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrum
270a3('bum): gi rkang pa lhur len pa ma yin/ dbang po lhur len pa ma yin/ stobs lhur len pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag lhur lon pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lhur len pa ma tshan
270a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa lhur len pa ma yin/ byas mgatan lhur len pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa lhur len pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lhur len pa ma yin/ rnam
270a5('bum): par tha rad pa brgyad lhum len pa ma yin/ mtha ra kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lhur len pa ma yin/ snang ba nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa lhur len pa ma
270a6('bum): yin/ mngon par shes pa lhur len pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind lhur len pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo lhur len pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lhur len pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs
270a7('bum): ba bzhi lhur len pa ma yon/ sa sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po lhur len pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po lhur len pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
270a8('bum): brgyad lhur le nad pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu lhu ri le nad pa ma yin/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur le nad pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin/ dgra
270b1('bum): bcom pa nyid lhur la nad pa ma yin/ rlung byang chub lhur len pa ma yin/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhur len pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/ 
270b2('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas su lta ba lhur le nang pa ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snyed pa lhur len pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thos
270b3('bum): tsad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la lhur blang ba bskyed pa'i dang gang gis bskyed pa dang / gang bskyed par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang dag par rjesu
270b4('bum): myi mthong ngo // de ci phyir zhen/ 'di lta na sgra thams kyi nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngas pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gis tshan nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
270b5('bum): dpa sems dpa'achen pa de nyid yod sa bya ba de dang ldan das spyad lam pa'ir 'gro'am/ 'dun yang narud pa'is sa kyis kyi 'gro/ nor ba'i sams kyis 'ong / nor ba'i sems
270b6('bum): na ma thasems kyis s+ho ldag/ no mngamams kyis kyi 'dug/ nor pa sems kyis kyi drang bzhin du 'gyu'o// dran bzhin du 'drong / dran pazhin du chag sa/ 
270b7('bum): na// ra pa na du gyu/ bzhi na mal/ ma / sa dang na ga 'anas kying ma
270b8('bum): sa 'i phyi la kyang ma ma canas kyim sa yi sa sems su rgyal ma
271a1('bum): sems can yongs su rnams la sbyin pa yangs su gtangs/ zas 'ad pa la na pas/ skam 'ad pa lan nom/ parang pa 'dad pa la ba'adapa/ gis 'dod pa la ga na/ 
271a2('bum): mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog/ gdug pa 'dod pa la gdug pa/ spos 'dod pa la spos/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa la 'phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa
271a3('bum): gnas/ nor dang 'bru dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye du rgya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor dang 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang
271a4('bum): dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul dang / da'achog chas dang / yo byad gzhan dang / gzhan dag kyang / de dag dang gzhan la yongs su gtong ste/ de dag kyang sbyin dang
271a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul lo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do/ gzhan gang sbyin pa'i pha rol/ 
271a6('bum): tu byind pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do// bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod la/ gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinond pa la yang dag/ 
271a7('bum): khyor spel la/ rdul khrims kyi pa ro lang du phyin pa tshi migos pa brjod do/ gzhan ga tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyad pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do// 
271a8('bum): bdag kyang bzod pa'i lalo tu phyind pa la srud do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsgral lo/ bzad pa'i pha rim tu byin pa'i legs pa brjod dang / gzhadagang gathong
271b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
271b2('bum): pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul/ 
271b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byind pA legs parjod do// gzhan gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do// bdag kyang bas
271b4('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang bsam dgatan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul lo// rabasam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do// gan
271b5('bum): gang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag gi nga legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do// bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang / 
271b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs brjod
271b7('bum): cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do// rab 'byor dedaphyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni khyim na gnas na yang 'dzam bu'i gling rin po che sna bdun gis bkang zhing sbyin pa yongasu
271b8('bum): gtong ngo // lding bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams rin po che sna bdun gis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // stong gi 'jig rten gi khams rin pa che sna bdun gis yongs su bkang dang/ 
272a1('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi kham/ 
272a2('bum): rin po che sna bdun gis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang / de 'dod pa la yongs su myi spyod de/ de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tshangs par spyod pa yin/ gnod pa gang gis gzhan mi dga' ba
272a3('bum): 'gyur ba'i gnong sems de lta bu gang yang myo spyad de/ rab 'gyu rang rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// 
272a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyi bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
272a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'di ni bla na snyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas nas kyang / bdag gyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chang
272a6('bum): par rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes yongs su srung zhing gnod sbyin lag ni rdo rje rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ngo // ci tsam du lag na rdo rje'i rigs rnams rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ba de tsa
272a7('bum): du de la myi 'am phyi ma yin pa dag gis gnod par myi nus te/ de la 'dzag rten na lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gang sus kyang chos dang mthun pas myed de/ de ni sems byang chub yid la byed pa nas
272a8('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rnam par 'khrug pa myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dbang po 'di lta ste/ myig gi dbang mi
272b1('bum): dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge/ 
272b2('bum): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ni skyes bu dam par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gis na/ byang chub sem
272b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam par 'gyur zhing skyes bu dam pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam byang chub kyi seMs
272b4('bum): myi 'khrugs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ skyes bu dam par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag
272b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldo ga par rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang phyir myi ldog/ pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub
272b6('bum): yid la bya ba dang ldan zhing bud med ze spong ba dbang du 'gyur ba'i sngags dang tshig gang ci yang rung ste/ brtsi de dag thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad myi sbyor/ sbyor du myi 'dug ste/ 
272b7('bum): ze slong ba'i bag gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang myi byed do// bud myed dang skyes pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag la yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul myi byed do/ bu 'am bu mo rigs kyi lha'i bu yod par 'gyur ro// / 
272b8('bum): zhe 'am tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes yongasu stond pa'i tshe 'phrul myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rjes/ 
273a1('bum): la mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bas/ 'tshor ba yongs su dag pa yin te/ rab 'byor de rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang mtshan
273a2('bum): ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa gang dang tshul gang
273a3('bum): dang mtshan ma gang dang ldan pa'is byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog par bya ba'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan ma de dag bstan gyis shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// 
273a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsolang nas/ tshe dang ldan dang rab 'byor de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor da 'di la/ 
273a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rtsa nad pa la spro'i tshe/ byang chub yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral ba yin te/ phung po'i sbyor ba la pha rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ 
273a6('bum): khams kyi sbyor ba la rjes su rtson par myi gnas/ skye mched kyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar/ 
273a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des phung po stong nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ khams stong pa nyid yongs su shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ skye mched stong pa nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ 
273a8('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid la byas pa yin/ de 'du 'dzi'i rtam gi sbyor ba la rje su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sos/ 
273b1('bum): sa tu ma shi ga mgasas rgya pa yini rna sa mas ma thong gi pa sbyor pa sa cho sa gyin
273b2('bum): can snang ba nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ de rgyal po'i gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang ba yang / 
273b3('bum): bzang po 'am ngan par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de rkun po'i gtom gi sbyor ba la rjes su myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas chos gang
273b4('bum): la yang blang ba 'am 'phrog pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de g.yul go gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de mo'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas
273b5('bum): chos gang yang nyung ngu'am mang por yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / de dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myig/ nas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad ma
273b6('bum): pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang tshogs sam/ tshogs ma yin pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // grong khyer gim gi sbyor ba la yang rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir/ 
273b7('bum): zhen / de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang gzung ba 'am myi bzung bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // grong rdal gau rtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ni
273b8('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas chos gang la yang 'brel ba'am 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bdag gi rtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ 
273b9('bum): sems can gi rta ma gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas srog gi gtam go sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ 'gro ba'i gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ gso ba'i gang+gA/ 
274a1('bum): gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ skyes bu'i rnam ga sbyor ba la rjes su btsun par myi gnas/ gang zag gi gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ shed can gi rnam
274a2('bum): sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ shed bdag gi gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ byed pa po'i gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtsom par myi gnas/ tshor ba po'i gtam gi sbyor ba la
274a3('bum): rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ shes pa po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ mthong ba po'i gtam ga sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
274a4('bum): 'i gtam gi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas tre/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing ser sna'i sbyor
274a5('bum): ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims ngan pa'i sbyor ba la rje/ sa su brtson par myi gnas so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
274a6('bum): la spyod cing / 'khrug pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing le lo'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so// bsam gdan gi pha rol pa
274a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod cing g.yeng ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing shes rab 'chal pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su mthun par myi gnas so// de chos thams
274a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing chos 'dod pa yin gi chos myi 'dod pa ma yin/ de chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing chos tha dad pa'i legs pa brjod pa ma yin/ de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub
274b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sems pa yin/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang bla na myed pa yang
274b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul zhing 'god do// rab tu gzhog go// de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed cing lta ba'i phyir
274b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba der skyes te/ der skye bar 'dod cing 'di ltar sangs rgyas yid la bya bas nyin mtshan du rnam par spyod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyi
274b4('bum): myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phal cher 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed cing dge za bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
274b5('bum): skye bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang po skyed/ bsam ga na gnyis pa skyed/ bsam gtan gsum pa la spyod/ 4sam gtan bzhi paskyed/ byams pa skyed/ snying rje skyed/ 
274b6('bum): dga' ba skyedapa btang snyoms skyed/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa skyed/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa skyedapa cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
274b7('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa skyed/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa skyed cing gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu gyur/ 
274b8('bum): par bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa der skyes te// rab 'byorang rnam pa de dag dang / nul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phy-ir
275a1('bum): myo ldog par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa
275a2('bum): dang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 
275a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dar ba
275a4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang bzhin stong po nyid la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang gri mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / myi dmyigs
275a5('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed/ pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dran pa nye ba
275a6('bum): bzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa dang / dbang po rnams la gnas pa dang / stobs rnams la gnas pa dang / 
275a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa dang / 
275a8('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la gnas pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang / rnam par thard pa rnams la gnas pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
275b1('bum): rnams la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo
275b2('bum): rnams la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas pa dang / byas pa chen po la
275b3('bum): gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas pa ni 'di snyam du bdag ni phyir myi ldog pa ma yin no snyam yang myi byed de/ the tsom mi skye zhing rang gis
275b4('bum): la yid gnyis myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des phyir ldog pa dang phyir myi ldog pa ma yin pa'i chos rdul tsam yang / dang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rab 'byor de 'di lta
275b5('bum): ste per na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i skyes bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'isal gnas pa ni rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom gyi 'am lan cig phyir 'ong ba lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sa
275b6('bum): gnas pa ni rang gi sA la nim nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o// phyir myi 'ong ba phyir myi 'ong ba'i sa lA nem nur myed cing the tsam myi za'o// dgra bcom pa'i sa la gnas pa ni rang gi si la nem nur byed cing the tsom kyi
275b7('bum): za'o// rang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing tho tsom mi'o// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing / 
275b8('bum): tsam myi za'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
276a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi sa la gnas pa yang nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o// de phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo // sems can rnams kyang / 
276a2('bum): dayongs su sbyin par byed do// bdud kyi las skyes shing 'byung ba dag kyang shes te/ bdud kyi las kyi dbang du myi 'gro'o// bdud kyi las de dag thams cad kyang rnam par 'jom zhing srab mor byed do// rab 'byor
276a3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshams myed pa lnga byed byed pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ka'i bar du yang mtshams myed pa'i sems dang myi 'bral mtshams myed pa'i sems de rjes su 'brang ngo // mtshams myed pa'i sems de thams cad
276a4('bum): kyis kyang rnam par bzhil myi nus te/ kun nas ldang pa de 'chi ka'i brar du rjes su 'brang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir myi ldog pa'i dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byas/ 
276a5('bum): sems kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te/ sems de rje pa rtag tu myed cing / myi skul bas de ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas de'i 'jig rten gis phyir bzlog myi nus so// de ci'i phyir ne
276a6('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar sems des lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/ yang dag pa'i skyon myed pa la zhugs pas der rang gi sa la gnas b+ha/ shing mngon par shes pa rnams la pha rol tu/ 
276a7('bum): phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongs su sbyin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / de dag la phyag bya ba dang / 
276a8('bum): chos mnyand pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang 'gro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang bskyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom
276b1('bum): ldan 'das de la kun tu 'dri zhing yongs su zhu ba byed snyen bkur ba byed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar gnas pas bdud kyi las skyes shing 'byung ba rnams khong du chud de bdud
276b2('bum): kyi las skyes shing 'byung ba dag gi dbang du yang myi 'gro'o// bdud kyi las de dag kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bas byed cing de rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom mi za'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
276b3('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' la nem nur myed cing yang dag pa'i mtha' la gcig gam gnyis su yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar shes pas de ltar che 'phos pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs
276b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'a di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos tham sa cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa la skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am kun
276b5('bum): nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tshe 'phos nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na myed pa yang dag
276b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro snyam du myi byed do// gton myi za bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ 
276b7('bum): ro snyam sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
276b8('bum): rang gi sa la de ltar gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la thub pa myed pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa ni myi 'phrog
277a1('bum): pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin te/ rab 'byor de gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas 'di skad du khyod kyis
277a2('bum): 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa thob par gyis shig/ khyod ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis khyod bla na
277a3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ba'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// rnam pa gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
277a4('bum): spyo pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag drang tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag kyang khyod la myed do zhes te rar yang / rab 'byor gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a5('bum): rnon pos sgra de thos nas kyang myi 'dzum myi 'gong zhing de'i sems gnan du myi 'gyur la yod la skrag par myi 'gyur na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
277a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ lung bstan de to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang dang ldan pas byang chub
277a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i/ chos de dag bdag la yod do zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig to can nam bdun
277a8('bum): kyis byin girlabs pa'i/ skyes bu zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi ma byang du nye bar 'ongs nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lung bstand kyang gal de byang chub sems
277b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du de bzhin na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis/ 
277b2('bum): la yang dag par skul ba myi mdzad de/ kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig to can gis byin gi rlabs pas skyes bu zhig sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du nye bar 'ongs so snyam du sems pa dang / gal te rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa'
277b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha don byed po la bdud sdig can gis sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du/ nye bar 'ongs nas/ de la 'di skad du gang la khyod kyis spyod pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni/ 
277b4('bum): bdud kyis bshad pa yin te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bshad rapa ma yin no zhes zer na/ rab 'byor du de la byang chub sems dpa' se
277b5('bum): dpa' chen pos kye ma/ gang bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i byang chub dang bral bar byed pa de ni bdud sdig to can nam bdud kyis byin gi rlabs pa'i skyes bu'o zhes bya bar rig par
277b6('bum): byed na/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
277b7('bum): byeng nub tu lung bston pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa den phyir gyi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o// deci 'byor zhe na/ gang byer gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sam
277b8('bum): dnga' chen pa rnams kyi/ rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag ni de la med do// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dung ldan pa'i byang chub sems pa
278a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyi/ 
278a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ bdag kyang yongs su gtong la/ srog kyang yongs su chud bar 'gyur yang chos de yongs su myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpal
278a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'di ltar brtson par byed de/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs/ 
278a4('bum): su bzung zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su myi gtong ba de lta darabartson par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni da 'di snyam du sems te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung na/ 
278a5('bum): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// 
278a6('bum): de la chos gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gdong zhing / srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang / sdod pa'i chos de gang zhe na/ rab 'byorang 'di la byang chub sems
278a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad stong do zhes chos ston to// de la skyes bu blun po la la 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/ 
278a8('bum): 'don ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin no// zhes phyir rgol zhing ngan du brjod do// rab 'byor nga chos de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gtong zhing / srog yongs su chad par
278b1('bum): 'gyur yang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar slab par bya ste/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi nang du
278b2('bum): bdag kyang drangs su gzhug go/ bdag kyang der lung bstan to// chos gang gi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba dang / srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang myi gtong ba de yang bdag gi chos so zhes slob
278b3('bum): po/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ bdag kyang yongs su gdong la srog kyang yongs su chad pa yin/ yang
278b4('bum): sdod pa yin no rab 'byor nga rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang
278b5('bum): phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas pa'i sangs rgyas chos stond pa la nem nur myed cing the tsom
278b6('bum): myi za zhing gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsungs pa de thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// de ltar bzung nas kyang chud zo bar myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzungs rab tu
278b7('bum): thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i di bzhin
278b8('bum): gshegs pas gzungs pa'i mdo rnams chab myi 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/ rab 'byorang myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs rab tu thob pas/ byang chub sems dag
279a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di bzhidi gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mang rnams chud myo thal nga de bzhin du rgyamatsha'i phyag rgya dang / bad po rnam par bkod pa dang/ de sangs su 'dzin pa
279a2('bum): rab tu thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhi gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdon mas chud kyi za'o/ gso med pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa pa yang ngo// 
279a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'ba' shig chab myi 'tshal du bas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa ma lags sam/ lhas bshad pa ma lags sam/ klus bshad pa ma lags sam/ 
279a4('bum): gnod sbyin gis bshad pa ma lags snyam/ dri zas pa shad pa ma lags som lha ma yin gis bshad pa ma lags sam/ nam mkha' lding gis bshad pa ma lag
279a5('bum): sam/ lto 'phye chen pos bshad pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ skad dang
279a6('bum): bda' dang sgra gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la nem nur myed cing / the tsom myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar des gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorade rnam pa de dag dang / 
279a7('bum): tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// 
279a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las// phyir myi ldog pa'i rnam pa dang tshul gi le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// 
279b1('bum): bam po / de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan
279b2('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang
279b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshad ma mchis/ drangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
279b4('bum): za na spyod du ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'a dras kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor daphyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
279b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// rab 'byor daphyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang snanga' chen po ni/ tshad myed pa grangs myed pa/ dpag tu myed
279b6('bum): pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bskyod du myed pa'iyon tan dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos
279b7('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes mtha' yas mu myed par rab tu thob te/ ye shes de la gnas shing / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so
279b8('bum): yang dag par rig pa mngon par sgrubs pa shang gis/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis dris kyang lan myi zad par myi nus par so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par
280a1('bum): bsgrub bo// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal/ 
280a2('bum): bar yang rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang mtshan ma gang gis phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por brjod pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rna
280a3('bum): pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma rnams ston pa'i mthu mnga' na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol da tu phyi nad pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa
280a4('bum): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
280a5('bum): bgyid pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyid pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par gyid pa dang / 
280a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par
280a7('bum): bgyid pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su
280a8('bum): rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa/ 
280b1('bum): myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yo/ 
280b2('bum): su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs
280b3('bum): su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs
280b4('bum): par bgyid pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ra bgyid pa dang / lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzog sa par bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs
280b5('bum): su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gnas zab mo zab mo rnams leg sa par bstond du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da legs so legs so// rab
280b6('bum): 'byorar khyod de ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas zab mo zab mo rnams 'dra bar sems pa legs so// rab 'byor nga zab mo
280b7('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 
280b8('bum): mya ngan las 'das pa dang / zhi ba dang de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste gang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas de dag ni gnas zab
281a1('bum): mo zhes bya ba dag go// gsol pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas su bas kyichos thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lags samabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
281a2('bum): 'byor zab mo zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzugs zab bo/ rab 'byor tshor ba zab bo// rab 'byor 'du shes zab bo// rab 'byor/ 
281a3('bum): 'du byed zab po/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa zab bo// rab 'byor dmyig zab po// rab 'byor rna ba zab bo// rab 'byorarang snga zab bo// rab 'byor nga lce zab po/ rab 'byor lus zab bo// rab 'byor
281a4('bum): yid zab po// rab 'byor nga gzugs kyang zab po/ rab 'byor du sgra yang za ba po/ rab 'byor da dri yang zab po/ rab 'byor da ro yang zab po/ rab 'byor da reg kyang zab po/ rab 'byor de chos
281a5('bum): kyang zab bo// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa yang zab po// rab 'byorarang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang zab po/ rab 'byo/ rang sna'i rnam par shes pa yang zab bo// rab 'byor nga lce'i rna
281a6('bum): par shes pa yang zab bo/ rab 'byor da lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor de yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang zab po// rab 'byor dmyig go 'dus te reg pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor da rna
281a7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo// rab 'byor da lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ rab 'byor yid su
281a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma zab po/ rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo// sa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo// rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
281b1('bum): tshor ba yang zab bo// rab 'byor lde'i 'dus te reg pad+ma'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab bo// rab 'byorang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
281b2('bum): yang zab po rab 'byor nga sa'i khams zab po/ rab 'byor nga chu'i khams zab bo// rab 'byor dmye'i khams zab bo// rab 'byor nga rlung gi khams kyang zab po/ rab 'byor de nam mkha'i khams kyang tha
281b3('bum): po rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang zab bo// rab 'byor ma rig pa yang zab bo// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang zab po// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor da mying dang gzugs
281b4('bum): kyang zab po/ rab 'byor de skye mched drug kyang zab po/ rab 'byor nga reg pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor da tshor ba yang zab da po/ rab 'byorang sred pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor len
281b5('bum): pa yang zab po/ rab 'byor nga srid pa yang zab pa/ rab 'byor skye ba yang zab bo// rab 'byor nga rga shi yang zab po// rab 'byor nga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang zab bo// rab 'byor
281b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang zab po// rab 'byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang zab bo// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang zab bo// rab 'byorang bsam gtan
281b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang zab po// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang zab po// rab 'byor nga nang stong pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor da phyi stong pa nyid kyang zab po// rab 'byor
281b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang zab po// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang zab po/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor 'dus byas
282a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang bab bo/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas snang brta kyang rab po/ 'ab 'byarang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang zab pa ka rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
282a2('bum): kyang zab bo/ rab 'byor dador ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad stong pa nyid la kyang zab bo// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid
282a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor dadangos po myed do// stong pa nyid kyang zab po/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ rab 'byor
282a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab po// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang zab bo// rab 'byor da ya / de dag par spong ba rnams kyang zab bo// rab 'byor rdzu
282a5('bum): 'phrul ga rkang pa rnams kyang zab bo// dbang po rnams kyang zab po/ rab 'byor de stobs rnams kyang bab pa/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang zab bo/ rab 'byor
282a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang zab bo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang zad po// rab 'byor nga bsam gtan rnams kyang zab po/ rab 'byor nga chad myed pa rnams kyang
282a7('bum): zab po// rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang zab pa/ ba 'gyur ba rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang zab bo// rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
282a8('bum): rnams kyang zab po/ rab 'byorarang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la yang zab bo// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang zab bo// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin
282b1('bum): rnams kyang zab za/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang zab bo// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang zab bo/ rab 'byor nga myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang zab bo/ rab 'byor ngas/ 
282b2('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang zab bo/ rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po yang zab po/ rarab 'byo da snying rje ma po yang zab po// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang zab bo// rab
282b3('bum): 'byor nga rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang zab po// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang zab bo// rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang zab po/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang zag
282b4('bum): po/ rab 'byor da rang byang chub kyang zab bo// rab 'byor lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zab bo// rab 'byor/ 
282b5('bum): ci ltar na gzugs zab/ ci ltar na tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na 'du shes zab/ ji ltar na 'du byed zab/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na myig zab/ ji ltar na rna ba zab
282b6('bum): ji ltar na snga zab/ ji ltar na lce zab/ ji ltar na lus zab// ji ltar na yid zab/ dza ltar na gzugs zab/ ji ltar na s+tha zab/ ji ltar na dri zab/ ji ltar na ro zab/ ji ltar na reg za ba
282b7('bum): ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na snga'i rnam par shes pa za'/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par she
282b8('bum): pa zab/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zang / ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus
283a1('bum): te reg pa zab/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
283a2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba za ba/ ji ltar na snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba za ba/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar ma
283a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar sa'i khams zab/ ji ltar na chu'i khams zab/ ji ltar na me'i khams zab/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams zab/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams zab
283a4('bum): ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams zab/ ji ltar na ma rig pa zab/ ji ltar na 'du byed zabs/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs zab/ ji ltar na skye mched drug za ba/ ji
283a5('bum): ltar na reg pa zab/ ji ltar na tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na sred pa zab/ ji ltar na len pa zab/ ji ltar na srid pa zab/ ji ltar na/ skye ba zab/ ji ltar na rga shi zab/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol
283a6('bum): tu phyin pa zab/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gi
283a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid zab stong pa nyid
283a8('bum): zagaji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab/ 
283b1('bum): ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zag
283b2('bum): ji ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
283b3('bum): zab/ ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams zab/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul dpeng po rnams zab/ ji ltar na stobs rnams zab/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag
283b4('bum): rnams zab/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lhag brgyad pa zab ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na ba sam gtan rnams zab/ ji ltar na tshad myed pa rnams zab/ 
283b5('bum): ji ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab/ ji lta ra na rnam par tha rad pa rnams zab/ ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams par 'jug pa rnams zab/ ji lta
283b6('bum): ma rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa zab/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzind rnams zab/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab/ ji ltaran
283b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab/ ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab/ ji ltar na byams pa chen po zab/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po zab/ ji ltar na
283b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zab/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab/ ji ltar na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid
284a1('bum): snru s+yA du ga sa / su sa byung ra/ gas pa sa ma ca ngas pa de bdud dgazugs / 
284a2('bum): tshar ba'i de bzhin nying nga lta bde bzhin du nang ba zab pa/ 'du shes kyang ba'in nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du shes zab thaMd 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dri lta ba de bzhir du'adu byed zab po/ rnam pa shes pa'i dri bzhin nyid ngalci ba de ba
284a3('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa/ tshig ga bzhin nyid nga lta bad brjind du myig pa' ba stan pa 'di bzhin nyid nge lta bde bzhinadun pa rab ba/ sna' di bzhin nong sto ba dustsa ba'i/ ste ring bzhin cing nges pa de bzhin
284a4('bum): lce zab bo/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du zlab bo// mang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid zab bo/ gzugs kyi deb bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gzugs zab bo// sgra 'ode bzhin nyid yang / 
284a5('bum): mu za de bzhin du snabab po/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du du za po/ ro 'di bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ro zab bo// reg gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg zab bo/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid jil ba
284a6('bum): de bzhin du/ chos zab po/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab po// 
284a7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i rnams par shes pa zab po/ 'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa phab po/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du
284a8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'ab pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di bzhin nyid/ ji la ba de bzhin du/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'bab/ myig gi 'dus de rig pa 'di bzhin nyid rdo lta pa de bzhin du srog gi lus te ga pa
284b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab zag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid rje lta ba de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab bo/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i rlung
284b2('bum): te reg pa zab bo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab bo/ yid kyi 'dun te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab bo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ 
284b3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab bo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab zo/ 
284b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab po// lce'i 'dus te reg dpa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg
284b5('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab bo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshe/ ra ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rkye nad kyis tshor ba zab bo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
284b6('bum): de byanam nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ze bzo/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sa'i khams zab bo/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid jil ba de bzhin du chu'i khams
284b7('bum): thab pa/ mye'i khams kya bzhin nyid nga lnga ba de bzhin du ma khams zab po/ zung po khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rlung gi khams 'bang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi banan nyid drilta ba de bzhin du nam kha kham
284b8('bum): zla zaza pa rnam par shes pa'i khams kya ba'i nyid jil bde ba'i du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa/ ma rig pa 'ode bzhin nyid jilta ba de bzhin du ma rig pa phab bo/ 'du byed kyi pa'ini nyid jilta ba de bzhin du/ 
285a1('bum): 'du byed zab po// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zab bo/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mying dang gzugs zab po// skye mched
285a2('bum): drug gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched drug zab po/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du reg pa zab po/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab po// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin
285a3('bum): du sred pa zab po/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du le nad pa zab bo/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du srid pa zab po/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du skye ba zab po/ rga shi'i de bzhin
285a4('bum): nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rga shi zab po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin med pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba
285a5('bum): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// bzod pa'i pha / rol tu phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
285a6('bum): phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa zab/ 
285a7('bum): bo/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab bo/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab po/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de
285a8('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid zab bo// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid zab po/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
285b1('bum): zab bo// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bani ma nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid zab bo/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du don dab pa stong pa nyid zab bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bani/ 
285b2('bum): da dri lta ba de bzhin du 'dus byas skang pa nyid kyang rab bo/ 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid spyod pa ni cing dril ba de bzhin du 'dus ma byas srung ba nyid bab pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi banan cad nges pade
285b3('bum): bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab po/ thog ma dang tha ma myod pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab po/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhi ni nyid ji lta ba de bzhin nyid du
285b4('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab bo// chos thams cad stong // pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa
285b5('bum): nyid zab bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin / du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab po/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa ste da kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
285b6('bum): zab po/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab bo// dngos po myed pa ngas
285b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab po// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zab bo// yang dag par
285b8('bum): spang ba rnams kyi pa'adi nyid jil pa de bzhin nyid du yang dag par spang ba rnams pab po// rdzu 'phrul gding pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid jil bde bzhin nyid du rdzu 'phrul gnang pa rnams zab bo// dbang pa rnams kyi na/ 
286a1('bum): nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dbang po rnams zab po/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stobs rnams zab po/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag
286a2('bum): rnams zab bo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab po/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags par
286a3('bum): bden pa rnams zab po/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams zab po/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshad myed pa rnams zab po/ gzugs myed pa'i snyom
286a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab bo// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par tha rad pa rnams za'o
286a5('bum): mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin nyid du mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab po// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon/ 
286a6('bum): pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa zab po/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams zab bo/ ting nge 'dzin
286a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzind rnams zab bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin
286a8('bum): nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab po/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myi 'jigs pa rnams zab bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin
286b1('bum): nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab bo/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byams pa chen po zab bo/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po bam// 
286b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab bo/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
286b3('bum): bu zab bo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zan
286b4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid za dab po/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang byang chub thu bo/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba
286b5('bum): de bzhin du lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid zab bo/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams nyecad mkhyend pa nyid zab po/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
286b6('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyi de bzhon nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi de bzhin
286b7('bum): nyid dri la bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig ga de bzhin nyid na rdo lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna pa 'di bzhin nyid na dril thul/ 
286b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das snga'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi de bzhin nyid ni
287a1('bum): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sgra'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dri'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu
287a2('bum): lags bcom ldan 'das ro'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das reg gi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
287a3('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta
287a4('bum): bu lagasabacom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ra ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
287a5('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de
287a6('bum): bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das nga lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
287a7('bum): 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
287a8('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo
287b1('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji
287b2('bum): lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
287b3('bum): chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags// 
287b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyide bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig
287b5('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'a ngas rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu la/ 
287b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta
287b7('bum): bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das len pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lag
287b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom
288a1('bum): ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das bzod// 
288a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhi nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin
288a3('bum): pa 'di bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin nyid rdo rje lnga bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni dzi lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
288a4('bum): 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu legs/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa de nyid stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chen po
288a5('bum): stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas/ 
288a6('bum): stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed
288a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
288a8('bum): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ji lta bu la
288b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rdzas
288b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gting pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
288b3('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di bzhin nyid du
288b4('bum): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
288b5('bum): 'das tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna/ mas kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
288b6('bum): par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thard pa na
288b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu legs/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin
288b8('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta
289a1('bum): khrumags bamam ldan 'das kyi 'dags pa rnams kya banan cad da sa nu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mam meng dag par ga pa rnams kyi de panan nyid na dris su lags/ ma ldan sa
289a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das d+hA tu zugs pa'i 'bris bu ngan dis bu lags/ bcom ldan 'as lan cig phyir rang ba'i 'bras bu canan cid nge lta bu lags kyu rnamam ldan 'das phyir gyi lhag par 'thas dun
289a3('bum): de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rang byang nga chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lam ni
289a4('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
289a5('bum): rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shAr+ya de la gzugs kyang myed/ gzugs kyang gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la tshor ba 'ang myed// 
289a6('bum): tshar ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ tshor ba 'od bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor nga 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la 'du shes kyang myed/ 'du shes las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ 'du shes kyi de banin
289a7('bum): nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du byed kyang myed / 'du byed las gu don 'ang de bzhin nyid myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
289b1('bum): de la rnam par shes pa 'ang myed/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi de bzhin nyid de la myig kyang myed/ myig las gud
289b2('bum): na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor da rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba 'ang myed/ rna ba las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor du sna
289b3('bum): de bzhin nyid de la sna 'ang myed/ sna las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor da lce'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'ang myed/ lce las gud na'ang / de bzhin nyid myed de/ lce'i de bzhin
289b4('bum): nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor da lus kyi de bzhin nyid de la lus kyu dang myed/ lus las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang yid kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ 
289b5('bum): yid kyang myed/ yid las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang myedagazugs las gud na
289b6('bum): 'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor du sgra'i de bzhin nyid de la sgra'ang myong/ sgra lus gud ni 'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor/ 
289b7('bum): dri'i de bzhin nyid de la dri'ang myed/ dri los gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor da ro'i de bzhin nyid de la'ang ro yang myed do// ro las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ ro'i
289b8('bum): de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor nga rog gi de bzhin nyid de la reg kyang myed/ reg las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ reg gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor de chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la chos
290a1('bum): kyang myedang chos las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la myig gi rnam par 'ashes pa 'ang myed
290a2('bum): myi gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor da rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'ang mye/ 
290a3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor de sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang myed// 
290a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byo// rang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i rnam par
290a5('bum): shes pa'ang myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
290a6('bum): de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'ang myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
290a7('bum): de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus
290a8('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor da rna ba'o// 
290b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang myed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na 'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
290b2('bum): pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la snga'i 'dus te reg pa'ang myong / snga'i 'dus te reg pa lnga
290b3('bum): gung na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i de gzhin nyid de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang med/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa las gu
290b4('bum): 'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang myed/ lus kyi 'dus
290b5('bum): te reg pa las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byorang yid kyi'i dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'ang / 
290b6('bum): myed yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i las gud na'ang de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o// rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/
